story: I'm raising money to buy a good gaming PC so I can finally play video games without lagging so I can start a gaming channel on YouTube with my friends.
story_txt: I'm raising money to buy a good gaming PC so I can finally play video games without lagging so I can start a gaming channel on YouTube with my friends.

story:
About Me

Hi! I'm Timothy Wredberg, an independent game developer from Austin, Texas. I recently left my government job to pursue my dream career in the gaming industry. I could no longer contain my passion for gaming, and had to do something about it. My experience in the field ranges from artwork and design to programming and development.

Projects

Since my initial start-up in March 2014 I have released 2 games on the Android market, Infinite Tower and Star Journey. I'm constantly working on updates for these to improve the user experience. I also have many projects in the works. 

Where your money goes 

I am hoping to receive funds to help with my monthly expenses during this transition phase between my previous job and my first income as a developer as well as the advertising and marketing costs associated with the game creation process. Even if you're unable to make a monetary contribution, a download and review of my games would be much appreciated. Thank you so much for your time and support. 

Sincerely,

Timothy Wredberg

Email: digitalsamuraigames@gmail.com

Website: www.digitalsamuraigames.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/digitalsamuraigames

Twitter: @DigitalSamurai9
story_txt: About MeHi! I'm Timothy Wredberg, an independent game developer from Austin, Texas. I recently left my government job to pursue my dream career in the gaming industry. I could no longer contain my passion for gaming, and had to do something about it. My experience in the field ranges from artwork and design to programming and development.ProjectsSince my initial start-up in March 2014 I have released 2 games on the Android market, Infinite Tower and Star Journey. I'm constantly working on updates for these to improve the user experience. I also have many projects in the works. Where your money goes I am hoping to receive funds to help with my monthly expenses during this transition phase between my previous job and my first income as a developer as well as the advertising and marketing costs associated with the game creation process. Even if you're unable to make a monetary contribution, a download and review of my games would be much appreciated. Thank you so much for your time and support. Sincerely,Timothy WredbergEmail: digitalsamuraigames@gmail.comWebsite: www.digitalsamuraigames.comFacebook: www.facebook.com/digitalsamuraigamesTwitter: @DigitalSamurai9

story:
Short Summary

My name is Naleek Rewop, I am currently running a campaign to help raise money to donate to a YouTube channel i subscribe to and really enjoy. The channel is run by a friend who lives in London, Ontario, Canada. The videos are all based around video games but unlike many channels there is a large variety of games and different styles of videos. From gameplay to tutorials to highlight reels and fail videos.

What makes this channel important to me is the joy that it brings its creator. Even thought the channel has not seen a large amount of views the creator consistantly posts content and records games endlessly to get content. The goal is to get money that the creator can use to buy new equipment (microphones, monitors, better computers) as well as better software (for recording and editing), as well as bring notoriety to the channel. 

Even if the goal is not reached hopefully the people who view the campaign page will atleast take the time to view 1 or 2 or perhaps even more of the videos on the channel and help him feel like his videos are bringing more people entertainment.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding goal is set at $2000 the number is based on the cost of items that could improve the quality of videos. These items include: A studio microphone ($350), a second monitor ($200), upgraded computer parts ($500), new software for recording and editing ($200-$2000 varies based on quality)
Our perks are more based on bringing people closer to the creator of the channel through personal interactions giving them a chance to play along side him in his games and be featured in videos on the channel that they are supporting (while remaining anonymous if preferred) 
All funds will be given to the channel through the items listed above or financial aid even if the goal is not met, anything will help and a large portion of the campaign is based simply around notoriety for the channel.

The Impact

The campaign has been created unannounced to the channel owner as to make the impact of the campaign even more significant. The channel creator simply makes the videos because he loves doing it, so having people around the world show support for him will be beyond amazing for him. The monetary aspect will be significant because it will help him develop more videos and make perfect them more to his liking and give him the ability to continue to do something that he loves and give more people like myself a chance to enjoy the content he puts out.

Risks & Challenges

This campaign has been created without the channel owners knowledge so the main challenge we will face is keeping the campaign hidden until the end date so it remains a surprise when it is finished. 

Another challenge that we face is reaching our financial goal, though not a large amount the channel is still small and people may be hesitant on donating to a small channel like this.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many other ways to help this campaign be a success. Simply visiting the channel and watching the videos is an amazing way to boost the confidence and moral or the channel owner. Following him on twitter, posting comments and suggestions on the videos for ways he can improve the videos are also great ways to help.

story:
Our Story

ZER0 LIMIT: Infinite Dreamer is the first game in the ZER0 LIMIT series.  In it, you are the dreamer. Your goals are straight forward: Run as fast as you can, jump as high as you can, and whatever you do, DON'T wake up.  Because when you wake up, the dream ends.







The game will take place in a fantasy landscape, where you're invited to explore upward as much as forward.  You, as the dreamer, will continue to accelerate until you do something which hinders it, like running into an obstacle, or particular items.  Regulate your speed to keep the game going.  Or don't, and see how long you can last.  Explore the skies as you use your speed to jump higher and higher, and see how long you can keep in the air without hitting the ground.  Just make sure to watch your landings.



The idea for the game came to Adam based on how he dreams. You hear often about people flying in their dreams.  But Adam's never been able to do that.  In his dreams, he tends to JUMP.  Very high, and very far, and with vivid hang times and free falls.  Add that with the other nonsense that you find in dreams and you've got the recipe for an interesting game.

We want to start full development of the game by the end of January, and have planned to develop the game in 3 months, meaning it should be out for the beginning of May 2012.

The Impact

This game is a stepping stone.  Throw Away Games has big plans for the ZER0 LIMIT series, and game development in general, but we have to pace ourselves.  Our first game being about a dream rings true for us, and by helping to fund it, you're helping us make it a reality.


What We Need & What You Get


We're looking for $5000 to pay the bills while we work on development.  This will also cover the costs of the software license, and any assets and fees that we haven't been able to scrape together for free.  Even if we don't meet our funding goal, this game WILL get finished.  It will just take much longer as focus will be diverted from development to fund raising.

We really want to give out free versions of the game to people who donate, but as of yet we have not found a suitable way (Apple only allows 50 promo codes to developers, which means not everyone would get a copy).  If anyone can inform of us of a way to do this, then we will add that to every donation level.  Outside of that, we're offering up our thanks, credit, and media to those of you who help support us.  Check out the perks for more details on what you can get.

Something else you want that's not already there??  ASK!  No promises, but we'll see what we can do :)

We're also looking for funding through other streams.  You can learn more here:
http://dreamer.throwawaygames.ca/take_part.php


Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends!  Spread the word!  Visit the game's site (http://dreamer.throwawaygames.ca/take_part.php) or the company's site (http://throwawaygames.ca/ ), follow us on Twitter, Facebook, and Google+, and just get the word out there.  It would mean the world to us.

story:
Crystalicum

Help us build an online, digital version of the well known Collectible Card Game!

Uwaga: Gra będzie dostępna również w języku polskim!

Nota: El juego también estará disponible en español cuando recoja $ 10,000!

Note: Le jeu sera également disponible en français quand vous rassemblez $ 20,000!

Hinweis: Das Spiel wird auch in Deutsch verfügbar, wenn Sie 30000 USD zu sammeln!

Welcome!

This is the crowdfunding campaign for Crystalicum, which is a MMO, CCG, RPG game. What does those acronyms stand for?

  • MMO – Massive, Multiplayer, Online
  • CCG – Collectible Card Game
  • RPG – Role Playing Game

At this point it might be good for you to take a look at the video, if you haven't done it already. It's a bit rough but shows a general concept of the game and its graphics. The gameplay is of course incomplete but it should give you a feel of the project.

On the visual side we wanted Crystalicum to be open to different graphic styles. That's why we gave illustrators cooperating with us a certain doze of freedom. The basic idea, however, is that illustrations' style refers mostly to the fable and fantasy style. That's why, in the game you can find illustrations inspired by Manga, European comics (i.e.  the "L'Epée de Cristal" series), the classic comic books and RPG.

Our goal is to combine beautiful game graphics with a concept of the collectible card game. The basic set of cards that we want to present will count about 200 cards - each with its own unique artwork.

With this collection you will be able to play the match wherever you are, on different platforms and even offline with your friends (printed edition will be available in selected regions). Game will also include extended RPG part with interesting plots and stories.

 

 

This game is a joint effort of many people over at least several years. From the people who created the game in an offline version to the people who somehow continue this enormous amount of work and want to move this game to the digital version, expanding its potential significantly. The project is being developed by:

Marcin Podsiadło - creator of many well-known game titles (RPG, board & collectible card games) mostly for the Polish market (but not only), including games such as "Crystalicum", "Saigo no Kane" and "7". He is considered one of the pillars of the Polish RPG industry.

Adam Kuczborski - participated in the creation of various business projects based on the Internet. He created marketing strategies for a number of themed social networks. He also has the experience in e-commerce and the development of trade fairs and events.

The team also includes at least a few other individuals not mentioned here. They are responsible for the programming, graphics, logistical or even spiritual support. Until now, our project was being created thanks to voluntary work of all these people, that is why it is impossible to list them all without forgetting even the slightest commitment.

 

 

The answer is really simple - we weren't ready for it. Moving the game to its online version required analyzing project's basics such as:

  • transferring the existing rules of the board game into the online game engine (technical possibilities)
  • costs analyzing and preparation of the project’s budget
  • evaluation of potential investors (financial opportunities)
  • research in the market interest - which means YOU - potential players of our game.

It all took time, which I hope has allowed us to reach the point where the next step will be a breakthrough in the online collectible card gameplay.

And this is where we need your support! Without you it will be much harder to complete the game!

 

 

Welcome to the "Crystalicum". The Universe which fate you're going to take in your own hands. The universe you will become familiar with is different from worlds know from the books, movies or comic fantasy. It is not limited by the mountains or deserts - but by the interstellar void. Crystalicum is a universe of infinite number of worlds orbiting around the multicolored suns. Its inhabitants are the representatives of the great races, wander through the vastness of Space on board of the ships, powered by the sun energy and magical power of the Crystal. They are discovering more and more new worlds, extraordinary creatures and incomprehensible wonders.

Entering the game you are taking the fate of one of the great civilizations of the Known Universe in your hands. Only you can decide which one of them will dominate the "Crystalicum" World. Do you have the right skills to lead your civilization to the glory and fame? Will you do anything to lead it towards its rightful place among the stars? Are you ready to put your actions on the cards of the history or will you go down into the oblivion.

The basic set of cards that we want to present will count about 200 cards - each with its own unique artwork. They will be divided into four types, according to the rules of the game. In the basic version, we would like to present the characters, places, ships belonging to the four major civilizations of the Known Universe. These will be the Ice Elves, Crystal Empire, Dragon Dwarves and Astonia. This, of course, is just the beginning of an adventure in the Crystalicum universe. Every 3 months we plan to publish new expansion sets, in which you can find new patterns of cards (we plan to make 110 new designs). We are also planning special expansion presenting another well-known civilizations of the universe.

 

 

As mentioned above, Crystalicum is:

  • MMO – Massive, Multiplayer, Online
  • CCG – Collectible Card Game
  • RPG – Role Playing Game

What does it mean? It means we want to create a game for everyone - true fantasy fans and casual players both. You don't need to know tons of rules to play Crystalicum. You will be able to start a game quickly with your own starter deck of cards.

All cards will be collectible. It means that they will have their own value depending on their rarity, value in the game or even printed edition. There is a special mechanism in the game that will make it possible to exchange or trade the cards between the users, purchase of still available card decks or single copies of the cards.

In addition, we plan to implement to the game the advanced ability to affect your own character. According to the rules of RPG you will be able to develop yourself as well as to take part in various feature plots (yes, like every game based on a fable fantasy, it will have its own storyline, evolving in time).

Key Features:

  • Challenging gameplay
  • The possibility of playing on different platforms
  • The possibility of collecting cards
  • The possibility of developing your own character what affects the gameplay
  • The possibility of searching for suitable opponents
  • The possibility of configuring the match anyhow you want (i.e. non-ranking or ranking game, with or without the awards or based on making bets between players)
  • Local and international tournaments
  • The possibility of searching players near our location
  • A cumulative reedition of slightly changed basic card decks once a year (about 200 types of cards), new additional extensions every 3 months (about 100 types of new cards).
  • The possibility of playing in an extensive world existing in other media (i.e. RPGs, books, board games, etc.)

Translations. Confirmed languages are English and Polish. French, Spanish and German translations depend on reached goal. Additional translations will be done according to the available resources.

 

 

We have been working on Crystalicum for the past several months and we're very proud of what we've accomplished so far. Unfortunately, our savings are running out and we have been forced to do other work that sometimes takes 100% of our time, leaving none of it to focus on developing the game. That's why if we don’t reach our goal ($18000) the production time will significantly extend.

We chose Indiegogo because it's a very open funding platform (contrary to others similar to it), we feel we can only innovate without barriers by remaining independent. Developing games is so special to us, it’s in some way a part of our lives.

 

 

We believe we’ve found the team of experienced, enthusiastic developers and artists to pick up from the earlier version of game and we want to make Crystalicum something truly epic.

We could pay the people who have recently offered their help on the project and would be able to properly hire them what we can't do right now.

That’s why we hope to raise enough money to complete our game. Here is what we will use the money for:

  • Programming: in order to build such an advanced project like ours we will need help of external developers at the beginning. In the comfort of our homes game engine programming would be unnecessarily time and resource consuming. And good programmers tend to value their work so much.
  • Hosting: Server hosting costs money, especially the servers with high bandwidth. Your money will help us to provide dedicated servers right for the massive multiplayer game.
  • Art: Although our wonderful graphic designers have already put a lot of work in this game, in order to fully devote themselves to this project, they also need to pay their own bills without the need to seek for alternative sources of funds needed to survive. So let's appreciate their contributions.
  • Music & Sound Effects: Like every respected Role Playing Game, our game should also have its own individual climate (which we hope you heard in our pitch movie). And it's extremely hard to create it without the good sound quality and inspiring music. And also the good musician must eat sometimes.
  • Administrative costs: running a business plus legal and tax advice.
  • Marketing costs: if it's meant to be a Massie Multiplayer Game we need to achieve an appropriate recognition of it, even in the markets where our products have not been released yet. Thus, part of the funds will be dedicated to supporting You. Above all, thanks to you – the players - we have the best possible ways of advertising - recommending the product to others!
  • Our own Survival: Rent, food... and internet to keep us still working on the game.

To finish our project and bring you a polished game, we will need about 6-12 months, working on it full time. That's why we need the funds necessary to keep us going. That brings us to the next question:

How does this crowd funding work?

Easy. You pledge an amount of money you choose (see the sidebar to the right). The pledge will be withdrawn from your account immediately. When the collecting is complete, the funds are transferred to us. Then we are sending the awards to you and continue our work.

 

 

If the unlikely event happen that funding were to overshoot our goal, and we exceed the minimal goal (if we aren’t asleep right now and dreaming), we will be able to bring you more cool stuff. Underneath we show you the stretch goals we managed to achieve:

1. Translations: we already mentioned that if the goal is reached at the level of:

  • $10000 - we will translate the game to Spanish language
  • $20000 - we will translate the game to French language
  • $30000 - we will translate the game to German language

2. If we reach our minimal goal ($18000) we will print the first edition of the game and it will be possible to buy it directly from us (or receive - look at the perks).

3. If we reach $30000 goal, we will be able to develop the game on every platform we would like to and start them at the same time. As mentioned above we want to give you the possibility of playing wherever you are and whenever you want!

4. If we reach $50000 we will be able to arrange a launch party in selected region and print at least two editions of the game.

5. If we reach $70000 we will do all the above plus we will be able to create comic book, book or animated mini series about adventures in Crystalicum universe.

 

 

We’re sure you’ve noticed the large amount of money we’re requesting to finish our game. Believe it or not, this sum could be higher, if we haven’t managed to use lots of arts and game concepts from the earlier developed games. We want to be honest so here’s the breakdown of how the money will be spent:

  • 66% - Game development
  • 12% - Marketing costs
  • 8% - Sallary
  • 4% - Hosting services
  • 4% - Accounting, tax & legal advice
  • 3% - Rent
  • 3% - other administrative costs

One final note: Indiegogo will deliver the cash as soon as we meet our first funding goal of $18000. So that means the sooner we reach that goal, the sooner we can get started on Crystalicum, the sooner we can show you progress, and the sooner we can release it. So if you intend to contribute, please do so at your earliest possible convenience!

 

 

We’re open to suggestions and ideas! And even though we have a pretty precise picture of what the game should look like (game mechanism have some limitations), we welcome helpful advices and honest opinions. Please write it here in comments or just e-mail us on indiegogo@crystalicum.eu

 

 

If we achieved our first goal, to finish game we will need about 8-12 months, working on it full time.

First closed beta (for limited testers, also recruited among You – look for the right perks) should be ready after 3-5 months after finishing this campaign.

We will open the game for everyone but with not all of it's functions completed and still in beta version probably 6-8 month from now (to exclude as much errors and engine balance as possible).

 

 

The game will be primarily a browser game. Available both on your own website as well as on selected social networks such as Facebook or other regional networks.

The game will also be available (in a less complex form) on mobile platforms such as iOS or Android.

All platforms will be using the same database – which means that wherever you play - you always have the access to your cards!

 

 

Of course this wouldn’t be a crowdfunding effort without goodies to motivate you to contribute. Here’s a run-down all of the individual rewards we’re offering:

(differences between perks were marked with a color)

- $5 Crewman

  • The satisfaction of helping to make this game a reality and a thank-you email from us!
  • Wallpaper pack.

- $15 Crystal Prospector

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Wallpaper pack.
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Special MP3 version from the Crystalicum OST.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!

- $30 Adventurer

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Wallpaper pack.
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Special MP3 version from the Crystalicum OST.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • "Mustang" – table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 150 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!

- $50 Merchant

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Wallpaper pack.
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • Digital version of the game's soundtrack.
  • Bronze Founders Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • "Tain" – table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 150 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!

- $75 Voyager

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • Digital version of the game's soundtrack.
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • A free booster from the Crystalicum.
  • Exclusive wallpaper pack.
  • Silver Founders Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • "Mustang" & "Tain" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 150 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!

- $100 First Officer

- $250 Captain

  • A thank-you email from us!

  • Signed postcard from our Team.
  • Digital and CD version of the game's soundtrack.
  • Exclusive signed Character Poster from the game.
  • "VIP" Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • A free three boosters and expansion pack from the Crystalicum.
  • You can create your own card! You may suggest an additional card name and its rule. It will be added after launching the game (the name and the rule must be in compliance with the game universe).
  • Exclusive founder T-shirt

- $500 Guild Master

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • Exclusive wallpaper pack.
  • "Mustang" & "Tain" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 150 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!
  • Art book with the making of materials (PDF).
  • "Yucatan" – table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 30 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!
  • Delivery reward costs are included.
  • Signed postcard from our Team.
  • Exclusive signed Character Poster from the game.
  • A free three boosters and expansion pack from the Crystalicum.
  • You can create your own card! You may suggest an additional card name and its rule. It will be added after launching the game (the name and the rule must be in compliance with the game universe).
  • Exclusive founder T-shirt
  • "Founding Fathers" Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
  • Limited CD edition of the Crystalicum Original Soundtrack.
  • "2 de Mayo" - table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 20 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!

- $1,000 Admiral

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • Exclusive wallpaper pack.
  • "Mustang" & "Tain" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 150 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!
  • Art book with the making of materials (PDF).
  • "Yucatan" – table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 30 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!
  • Delivery reward costs are included.
  • Signed postcard from our Team.
  • You can create your own card! You may suggest an additional card name and its rule. It will be added after launching the game (the name and the rule must be in compliance with the game universe).
  • Exclusive founder T-shirt
  • "Founding Fathers" Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
  • Limited CD edition of the Crystalicum Original Soundtrack.
  • "2 de Mayo" - table game published earlier by us (English instruction included) – only for first 20 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!
  • Highly exclusive signed Character Poster from game (tell us what you want us to draw for you from the game).
  • Receive a printed edition of Crystalicum Starter Pack (if it would be printed)
  • Game content from the game released during the first year after its release. It will include at least one starting pack, three expansion, and five boosters from the Crystalicum.
  • "Mecanisburgo", "Kazaam", "Club" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included) - only for first 10 contributors (see F.A.Q. in project summary)!

- $2,500 Patron

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Your name will be added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • Exclusive wallpaper pack.
  • Art book with the making of materials (PDF).
  • Delivery reward costs are included.
  • Signed postcard from our Team.
  • You can create your own card! You may suggest an additional card name and its rule. It will be added after launching the game (the name and the rule must be in compliance with the game universe).
  • Exclusive founder T-shirt
  • "Founding Fathers" Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
  • Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
  • Limited CD edition of the Crystalicum Original Soundtrack.
  • Highly exclusive signed Character Poster from game (tell us what you want us to draw for you from the game).
  • Receive a printed edition of Crystalicum Starter Pack (if it would be printed)
  • Game content from the game released during the first year after its release. It will include at least one starting pack, three expansion, and five boosters from the Crystalicum.
  • The credit of Co-Executive Producer in the game's credits. Only three slots available. Which means you will have access to our work, become honorary member of the development team and your word will be listened! Please understand that you will be required to sign an NDA because with this perk you will gain access to some of the business secrets.
  • You can visit us in Warsaw or Cracow in Poland (transportation and accommodation costs are not included) and hang out with us for a whole day! We'll play a game together, talk about it, or just do whatever you want!
  • "Mustang", "Tain", "Yucatan", "2 de Mayo", "Mecanisburgo", "Kazaam", "Club" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included)!

 

And our special award...

- Inesh (Special Social Reward)

  • A thank-you email from us!
  • Your name added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
  • Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
  • Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
  • The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
  • Exclusive wallpaper pack.
  • A special badge in the online play showing your contribution (it will matter in the game!).
  • Digital version of the game's soundtrack.
  • Signed postcard from our Team.
  • A free expansion pack from the Crystalicum.
  • Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
  • Delivery reward costs are included.
  • Receive a printed edition of Crystalicum Starter Pack (if it would be printed)
  • "Mustang", "Tain", "Yucatan", "2 de Mayo" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included)!

 

 

Let everybody know about Crystalicum!

Share this page on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks (the buttons for this are below the pitch video).

We get the most fans from sites related to gaming. If you know a website you like and it hasn't written about our campaign and you think it should, don't hesitate to send them a tip!

Spread the word and share the campaign via Indiegogo tools, on social networks, blogs, forums - basically everywhere. Talk to friends and other gamers about it. Share the link. There are hundreds of thousands of fans out there, but many of them are not plugged in to the community and are hard for us to find. Let them know that today is the day!

 

 

The more noise we make, the more money we’ll raise, and the more likely this campaign will keep Crystalicum and its community growing. To encourage you to get all of your friends and neighbors to join the fun, we will grant a special award. The award will go to whoever brings the most contributions in using Indiegogo’s sharing tools. So even if you can’t afford to contribute yourself, you can still win if you manage to gather most of the money through your own connections and campaigning.

If you can’t contribute and want to go for the prize, just be sure to create an Indiegogo account and use its tools!

 

 

1. Risk of delay. There is always a possibility that the game will be delayed due to technical problems, unforeseen circumstances, also, like all creative projects, some mechanics may be changed if we consider them to be hurting the game - but don't worry, we will do everything so that you (and us) will get to play the game as soon as possible.

2. Shipping international orders. Please add $5 for shipping within Poland, $25 for shipping within Europe and $35 for the rest of the world. I know, that's high, but shipping costs are insane. :( Shipping will be included starting with the $150 perk.

3. How many languages does Crystalicum support? The confirmed languages are English and Polish - French, Spanish, German and other additional translations will be done according to available resources (as we mentioned at the begining of the page).

4. When will I get my rewards? Some of the rewards will be delivered after the final release of the game, although some digital rewards or game rewards may be sent to you sooner.

5. Upgrading pledges: Want to upgrade your contribute? No problem! Indiegogo doesn’t support it directly, so here’s how to do it:

  • 1. Make a new contribute in the amount equal to the difference between the perks.
  • 2. Send us an e-mail at indiegogo@crystalicum.eu along with your username and describe the upgrade.
  • For example: You pledged $30 to get the Adventurer perk and want to get the Merchant, so you contribute an additional 20$ and drop us a mail. Easy!

6. Table game rewards: As we mentioned in perks decription, the ammount of reward games are limited. So if it is not written directly in the perk you will receive the game when:

  • you're one of the first who contribute to the game
  • you declare that you want it (in perks where shipping cost must be added, we will contact you if you don't contact us)

 

 

Our final words...

Crystalicum is in your hands. By now you probably already decided whether you'd like to help our project or not. So all we can add is that we'll do our best to try and answer any questions you may have in an upcoming updates.

Remember: together we can create something truly memorable!

Thank you for reading this!

Crystalicum Team.
story_txt:
Crystalicum
Help us build an online, digital version of the well known Collectible Card Game!

Uwaga: Gra będzie dostępna również w języku polskim!
Nota: El juego también estará disponible en español cuando recoja $ 10,000!
Note: Le jeu sera également disponible en français quand vous rassemblez $ 20,000!
Hinweis: Das Spiel wird auch in Deutsch verfügbar, wenn Sie 30000 USD zu sammeln!
Welcome!
This is the crowdfunding campaign for Crystalicum, which is a MMO, CCG, RPG game. What does those acronyms stand for?

MMO – Massive, Multiplayer, Online
CCG – Collectible Card Game
RPG – Role Playing Game
At this point it might be good for you to take a look at the video, if you haven't done it already. It's a bit rough but shows a general concept of the game and its graphics. The gameplay is of course incomplete but it should give you a feel of the project.
On the visual side we wanted Crystalicum to be open to different graphic styles. That's why we gave illustrators cooperating with us a certain doze of freedom. The basic idea, however, is that illustrations' style refers mostly to the fable and fantasy style. That's why, in the game you can find illustrations inspired by Manga, European comics (i.e.  the "L'Epée de Cristal" series), the classic comic books and RPG.
Our goal is to combine beautiful game graphics with a concept of the collectible card game. The basic set of cards that we want to present will count about 200 cards - each with its own unique artwork.
With this collection you will be able to play the match wherever you are, on different platforms and even offline with your friends (printed edition will be available in selected regions). Game will also include extended RPG part with interesting plots and stories.
 

 
This game is a joint effort of many people over at least several years. From the people who created the game in an offline version to the people who somehow continue this enormous amount of work and want to move this game to the digital version, expanding its potential significantly. The project is being developed by:Marcin Podsiadło - creator of many well-known game titles (RPG, board & collectible card games) mostly for the Polish market (but not only), including games such as "Crystalicum", "Saigo no Kane" and "7". He is considered one of the pillars of the Polish RPG industry.Adam Kuczborski - participated in the creation of various business projects based on the Internet. He created marketing strategies for a number of themed social networks. He also has the experience in e-commerce and the development of trade fairs and events.
The team also includes at least a few other individuals not mentioned here. They are responsible for the programming, graphics, logistical or even spiritual support. Until now, our project was being created thanks to voluntary work of all these people, that is why it is impossible to list them all without forgetting even the slightest commitment.
 

 
The answer is really simple - we weren't ready for it. Moving the game to its online version required analyzing project's basics such as:

transferring the existing rules of the board game into the online game engine (technical possibilities)
costs analyzing and preparation of the project’s budget
evaluation of potential investors (financial opportunities)
research in the market interest - which means YOU - potential players of our game.
It all took time, which I hope has allowed us to reach the point where the next step will be a breakthrough in the online collectible card gameplay.
And this is where we need your support! Without you it will be much harder to complete the game!
 

 
Welcome to the "Crystalicum". The Universe which fate you're going to take in your own hands. The universe you will become familiar with is different from worlds know from the books, movies or comic fantasy. It is not limited by the mountains or deserts - but by the interstellar void. Crystalicum is a universe of infinite number of worlds orbiting around the multicolored suns. Its inhabitants are the representatives of the great races, wander through the vastness of Space on board of the ships, powered by the sun energy and magical power of the Crystal. They are discovering more and more new worlds, extraordinary creatures and incomprehensible wonders.
Entering the game you are taking the fate of one of the great civilizations of the Known Universe in your hands. Only you can decide which one of them will dominate the "Crystalicum" World. Do you have the right skills to lead your civilization to the glory and fame? Will you do anything to lead it towards its rightful place among the stars? Are you ready to put your actions on the cards of the history or will you go down into the oblivion.
The basic set of cards that we want to present will count about 200 cards - each with its own unique artwork. They will be divided into four types, according to the rules of the game. In the basic version, we would like to present the characters, places, ships belonging to the four major civilizations of the Known Universe. These will be the Ice Elves, Crystal Empire, Dragon Dwarves and Astonia. This, of course, is just the beginning of an adventure in the Crystalicum universe. Every 3 months we plan to publish new expansion sets, in which you can find new patterns of cards (we plan to make 110 new designs). We are also planning special expansion presenting another well-known civilizations of the universe.
 

 
As mentioned above, Crystalicum is:

MMO – Massive, Multiplayer, Online
CCG – Collectible Card Game
RPG – Role Playing Game
What does it mean? It means we want to create a game for everyone - true fantasy fans and casual players both. You don't need to know tons of rules to play Crystalicum. You will be able to start a game quickly with your own starter deck of cards.
All cards will be collectible. It means that they will have their own value depending on their rarity, value in the game or even printed edition. There is a special mechanism in the game that will make it possible to exchange or trade the cards between the users, purchase of still available card decks or single copies of the cards.
In addition, we plan to implement to the game the advanced ability to affect your own character. According to the rules of RPG you will be able to develop yourself as well as to take part in various feature plots (yes, like every game based on a fable fantasy, it will have its own storyline, evolving in time).
Key Features:

Challenging gameplay

The possibility of playing on different platforms


The possibility of collecting cards


The possibility of developing your own character what affects the gameplay


The possibility of searching for suitable opponents

The possibility of configuring the match anyhow you want (i.e. non-ranking or ranking game, with or without the awards or based on making bets between players)
Local and international tournaments
The possibility of searching players near our location
A cumulative reedition of slightly changed basic card decks once a year (about 200 types of cards), new additional extensions every 3 months (about 100 types of new cards).

The possibility of playing in an extensive world existing in other media (i.e. RPGs, books, board games, etc.)

Translations. Confirmed languages are English and Polish. French, Spanish and German translations depend on reached goal. Additional translations will be done according to the available resources.
 

 
We have been working on Crystalicum for the past several months and we're very proud of what we've accomplished so far. Unfortunately, our savings are running out and we have been forced to do other work that sometimes takes 100% of our time, leaving none of it to focus on developing the game. That's why if we don’t reach our goal ($18000) the production time will significantly extend.
We chose Indiegogo because it's a very open funding platform (contrary to others similar to it), we feel we can only innovate without barriers by remaining independent. Developing games is so special to us, it’s in some way a part of our lives.
 

 
We believe we’ve found the team of experienced, enthusiastic developers and artists to pick up from the earlier version of game and we want to make Crystalicum something truly epic.
We could pay the people who have recently offered their help on the project and would be able to properly hire them what we can't do right now.
That’s why we hope to raise enough money to complete our game. Here is what we will use the money for:

Programming: in order to build such an advanced project like ours we will need help of external developers at the beginning. In the comfort of our homes game engine programming would be unnecessarily time and resource consuming. And good programmers tend to value their work so much.
Hosting: Server hosting costs money, especially the servers with high bandwidth. Your money will help us to provide dedicated servers right for the massive multiplayer game.
Art: Although our wonderful graphic designers have already put a lot of work in this game, in order to fully devote themselves to this project, they also need to pay their own bills without the need to seek for alternative sources of funds needed to survive. So let's appreciate their contributions.
Music & Sound Effects: Like every respected Role Playing Game, our game should also have its own individual climate (which we hope you heard in our pitch movie). And it's extremely hard to create it without the good sound quality and inspiring music. And also the good musician must eat sometimes.
Administrative costs: running a business plus legal and tax advice.
Marketing costs: if it's meant to be a Massie Multiplayer Game we need to achieve an appropriate recognition of it, even in the markets where our products have not been released yet. Thus, part of the funds will be dedicated to supporting You. Above all, thanks to you – the players - we have the best possible ways of advertising - recommending the product to others!
Our own Survival: Rent, food... and internet to keep us still working on the game.
To finish our project and bring you a polished game, we will need about 6-12 months, working on it full time. That's why we need the funds necessary to keep us going. That brings us to the next question:
How does this crowd funding work?
Easy. You pledge an amount of money you choose (see the sidebar to the right). The pledge will be withdrawn from your account immediately. When the collecting is complete, the funds are transferred to us. Then we are sending the awards to you and continue our work.
 

 
If the unlikely event happen that funding were to overshoot our goal, and we exceed the minimal goal (if we aren’t asleep right now and dreaming), we will be able to bring you more cool stuff. Underneath we show you the stretch goals we managed to achieve:
1. Translations: we already mentioned that if the goal is reached at the level of:

$10000 - we will translate the game to Spanish language
$20000 - we will translate the game to French language
$30000 - we will translate the game to German language
2. If we reach our minimal goal ($18000) we will print the first edition of the game and it will be possible to buy it directly from us (or receive - look at the perks).
3. If we reach $30000 goal, we will be able to develop the game on every platform we would like to and start them at the same time. As mentioned above we want to give you the possibility of playing wherever you are and whenever you want!
4. If we reach $50000 we will be able to arrange a launch party in selected region and print at least two editions of the game.
5. If we reach $70000 we will do all the above plus we will be able to create comic book, book or animated mini series about adventures in Crystalicum universe.
 

 
We’re sure you’ve noticed the large amount of money we’re requesting to finish our game. Believe it or not, this sum could be higher, if we haven’t managed to use lots of arts and game concepts from the earlier developed games. We want to be honest so here’s the breakdown of how the money will be spent:

66% - Game development
12% - Marketing costs
8% - Sallary
4% - Hosting services
4% - Accounting, tax & legal advice
3% - Rent
3% - other administrative costs
One final note: Indiegogo will deliver the cash as soon as we meet our first funding goal of $18000. So that means the sooner we reach that goal, the sooner we can get started on Crystalicum, the sooner we can show you progress, and the sooner we can release it. So if you intend to contribute, please do so at your earliest possible convenience!
 

 
We’re open to suggestions and ideas! And even though we have a pretty precise picture of what the game should look like (game mechanism have some limitations), we welcome helpful advices and honest opinions. Please write it here in comments or just e-mail us on indiegogo@crystalicum.eu
 

 
If we achieved our first goal, to finish game we will need about 8-12 months, working on it full time.
First closed beta (for limited testers, also recruited among You – look for the right perks) should be ready after 3-5 months after finishing this campaign.
We will open the game for everyone but with not all of it's functions completed and still in beta version probably 6-8 month from now (to exclude as much errors and engine balance as possible).
 

 
The game will be primarily a browser game. Available both on your own website as well as on selected social networks such as Facebook or other regional networks.
The game will also be available (in a less complex form) on mobile platforms such as iOS or Android.
All platforms will be using the same database – which means that wherever you play - you always have the access to your cards!
 

 
Of course this wouldn’t be a crowdfunding effort without goodies to motivate you to contribute. Here’s a run-down all of the individual rewards we’re offering:
(differences between perks were marked with a color)
- $5 Crewman

The satisfaction of helping to make this game a reality and a thank-you email from us!
Wallpaper pack.
- $15 Crystal Prospector

Signed postcard from our Team.
You can create your own card! You may suggest an additional card name and its rule. It will be added after launching the game (the name and the rule must be in compliance with the game universe).
Exclusive founder T-shirt
"Founding Fathers" Online Badge (it will matter in the game!).
Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
Limited CD edition of the Crystalicum Original Soundtrack.
Highly exclusive signed Character Poster from game (tell us what you want us to draw for you from the game).
Receive a printed edition of Crystalicum Starter Pack (if it would be printed)
Game content from the game released during the first year after its release. It will include at least one starting pack, three expansion, and five boosters from the Crystalicum.
The credit of Co-Executive Producer in the game's credits. Only three slots available. Which means you will have access to our work, become honorary member of the development team and your word will be listened! Please understand that you will be required to sign an NDA because with this perk you will gain access to some of the business secrets.
You can visit us in Warsaw or Cracow in Poland (transportation and accommodation costs are not included) and hang out with us for a whole day! We'll play a game together, talk about it, or just do whatever you want!
"Mustang", "Tain", "Yucatan", "2 de Mayo", "Mecanisburgo", "Kazaam", "Club" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included)!
 
And our special award...
- Inesh (Special Social Reward)

A thank-you email from us!
Your name added to a special credits section in the Crystalicum, on a special memorial website dedicated to the campaign.
Strategy guide (PDF), sent to you before the game launches!
Access to the Beta version of Crystalicum.
The Survival Kit with exclusive in-game cards to help you live through the first few nights!
Exclusive wallpaper pack.
A special badge in the online play showing your contribution (it will matter in the game!).
Digital version of the game's soundtrack.
Signed postcard from our Team.
A free expansion pack from the Crystalicum.
Special, personalized and highly limited certificate showing your contribution to the Crystalicum.
Delivery reward costs are included.
Receive a printed edition of Crystalicum Starter Pack (if it would be printed)
"Mustang", "Tain", "Yucatan", "2 de Mayo" – table games published earlier by us (English instruction included)!
 

 
Let everybody know about Crystalicum!
Share this page on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks (the buttons for this are below the pitch video).
We get the most fans from sites related to gaming. If you know a website you like and it hasn't written about our campaign and you think it should, don't hesitate to send them a tip!
Spread the word and share the campaign via Indiegogo tools, on social networks, blogs, forums - basically everywhere. Talk to friends and other gamers about it. Share the link. There are hundreds of thousands of fans out there, but many of them are not plugged in to the community and are hard for us to find. Let them know that today is the day!
 

 
The more noise we make, the more money we’ll raise, and the more likely this campaign will keep Crystalicum and its community growing. To encourage you to get all of your friends and neighbors to join the fun, we will grant a special award. The award will go to whoever brings the most contributions in using Indiegogo’s sharing tools. So even if you can’t afford to contribute yourself, you can still win if you manage to gather most of the money through your own connections and campaigning.
If you can’t contribute and want to go for the prize, just be sure to create an Indiegogo account and use its tools!
 

 
1. Risk of delay. There is always a possibility that the game will be delayed due to technical problems, unforeseen circumstances, also, like all creative projects, some mechanics may be changed if we consider them to be hurting the game - but don't worry, we will do everything so that you (and us) will get to play the game as soon as possible.2. Shipping international orders. Please add $5 for shipping within Poland, $25 for shipping within Europe and $35 for the rest of the world. I know, that's high, but shipping costs are insane. :( Shipping will be included starting with the $150 perk.3. How many languages does Crystalicum support? The confirmed languages are English and Polish - French, Spanish, German and other additional translations will be done according to available resources (as we mentioned at the begining of the page).4. When will I get my rewards? Some of the rewards will be delivered after the final release of the game, although some digital rewards or game rewards may be sent to you sooner.
5. Upgrading pledges: Want to upgrade your contribute? No problem! Indiegogo doesn’t support it directly, so here’s how to do it:

1. Make a new contribute in the amount equal to the difference between the perks.
2. Send us an e-mail at indiegogo@crystalicum.eu along with your username and describe the upgrade.
For example: You pledged $30 to get the Adventurer perk and want to get the Merchant, so you contribute an additional 20$ and drop us a mail. Easy!
6. Table game rewards: As we mentioned in perks decription, the ammount of reward games are limited. So if it is not written directly in the perk you will receive the game when:

you're one of the first who contribute to the game
you declare that you want it (in perks where shipping cost must be added, we will contact you if you don't contact us)
 

 
Our final words...
Crystalicum is in your hands. By now you probably already decided whether you'd like to help our project or not. So all we can add is that we'll do our best to try and answer any questions you may have in an upcoming updates.
Remember: together we can create something truly memorable!
Thank you for reading this!
Crystalicum Team.

story:
UPDATE: YOU CAN INSTALL OUR FIRST DEMO ON ANDROID DEVICES. FIND IT HERE

 

  

Hello dear friends,

We are so excited to present our first joint project - the game that will show the capacity and enthusiasm of our small but great team!


Who we are?

Imagine, that you have 4 people, passion in doing animation, design, one developer and a PR person and you know all of them have the curiosity and the imaginations of a little kid and the expertise in their field. What do you think will be the result if you gather them for one project?


Yeap, you are right.. nothing but a game that you have to save your pub from a mad koala... make sense, don’t you agree?


So, here we are. A couple of friends, gathered together with the idea to give the floor to YOU, to express your feeling - madness, sadness, love or just to have fun, relax and enjoy one alternative yet imaginative world.

Music: 10 dead fingers


Why you should support us?


First, because you are great and you know it ;)
Second, because you are going to receive a simple, good looking, fun and relieving game that you can play anytime, anyplace from your Android smartphone!

* If we meet our goal, we will seriously concider publishing the game for iOS 


How is the game different from all the other?


It combines excellent graphic, tells interesting story, provoke with tempting achievements and … well, let’s leave a little mystery for the end.

 

How will you progress through the game?


You will have to fight your way to glory and peace with other bad visitors in the pub. After each match you will earn money that you can spend on drinks to temporarily build up your stats or buy better fighting equipment, sold from the bartender before every fight. Each fight makes you a little bit more experienced and strong. Train in the basement, fight with the berserk animals until you clear them out of the pub so you and your friends can enjoy the beer in peace


What we need? (and why you should care)


We want to understand if we are really good at what we are doing. We want to confirm our feeling that the combination of these people, gather together is a good one. Also, we want to make people laugh, have fun, relax and enjoy life … by the only way we can do it.


We need $3000 USD for licensing fees and finishing the game

 

If we succeed with this one, we are planning more games to come.

 

The good thing for you?


You will make a good deed - you will help a start-up and you will show to the others that it is possible to succeed if you have nothing but a big heart and a lot of ideas.


You will be the first to try the game, you will receive a special wallpaper to bring the atmosphere of the game or even more! - your name will be included in the credits! You want more? A special T-shirt or your own avatar!


And last but not least - let’s be honest.. you just wanna beat the hell out of someone, don’t you? Ok, then support us with the biggest package and send us the photo of the enemy (we promise your girlfriend will NEVER understand that this is her mother. We promise.)

T-Shirt:


And... oh, let’s just start the game!!


Immerse yourself in the game and spread the word by sharing to Facebook, Twitter or by sending this link http://igg.me/at/fight-pub

story:
Short Summary

Hey All!

My name is Willy Dope, and I'm one half of the Hip-Hop group Par-City. I come from the Bronx, NY and have been involved in the music industry for a few years now. My Hip-Hop group has seen some successes over the course of our careers, and have had great support from our fans! We recently decided to do solo projects...No, Par-City isn't splitting up, but working on solo projects is a way for GiF and I to each define our individuality and brand. GiF released 'Small Fortune' exclusively on DatPiff.com in January, and I plan on releasing my project, 'Dope Game,' later this year. Alongside my release, I would like to provide another interactive way for you, the fans, to interact with our music! So, I've prepared a sketch for my new "Dope" Game, 'Dope Game' (bearing the same namesake as the project) a video game app that will be sure to be addictive!!! I need help raising funds to create this game, and publish it to the app stores. We have some of the best app designers at very reasonable rates, and want to bring the fans a TOP QUALITY product! 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to get $4,000. Why? Because we are designing a BRAND NEW game from scratch. It contains elements of past video games and combines them into one "Dope" experience. 

  • a majority of the funds will be paid to our app developer, he has worked on a number of very popular games currently selling in the app store.
  • perks for your donations include: free merch (cds, stickers, t-shirts, hats), appearance in Par-City music videos, a chance to spend the day with Par-City, an on-stage VIP experience with Par-City during a performance, and much much more!!! - VERY SOON, we will have a donation structure, to let you know what you're getting for your exact donation!
  • no matter what we raise, we intend to put ALL funds towards the creation of 'Dope Game,' the video game app.

Other Ways You Can Help

Become a Fan of Par-City on Facebook - www.Facebook.com/ParCity

Watch our videos on YouTube - www.YouTube.com/ParCitizens

Follow us on Instagram: www.Instagram.com/ParCitizens

www.Instagram.com/WillyDope & www.Instagram.com/GiFTheGreat

Follow us on Twitter: www.Twitter.com/ParCitizens  

www.Twitter.com/WillyDope & www.Twitter.com/GiFTheGreat

story:
Summary


[PAYPAL PAYMENTS ONLY BECAUSE ITS A CANADIAN PROJECT]

[BECAUSE OF SEVERAL REQUESTS ONCE I AM FINISHED DEVELOPING ON BLACKBERRY 10 I AM GOING TO PORT FINAL VERSION TO ANDROID AND WINDOWS PHONE.]

Hello Generous Gamers, my name is Tony Mountjoy and I have a game idea I'd like to develop on mobile platforms. I've been programming professionally for almost 14 years working mostly in the C programming language on desktops, servers, and clusters.
 
Though I have found success writing business applications for my company Asmotek, which I really enjoy, I'd like to try building an entertainment product based on my own creative ideas. I've programmed the game framework and developed the story, but I can't do all the audio, graphics and acting for the animations on my own.
 
I have a green screen studio and a working partnership with a local Gemini award winning sound studio, Talking Dog Studios, who are interested in helping me create a rich sound library, which is critical to a good horror game.
 

What I Need And What You Get

I am aiming for at least $15000.00 in funding mostly for sound and video development with the actors I need to bring into my studio for the animation sequences. I've already spent the last couple of months developing the code set, refining the interface, debugging, writing story scripts and beta testing performance.
 
With your help I can hire the artists and actors I need to finish the first version and set the standard for new content down the road. The actors will be used for digital animation sequences, mostly monster silhouettes and other game characters. I also need to complete the hook for the "Boss Challenge" and fine tune the mini-games that are triggered along the story arc.
 
If you help me I will create a cool game series that my company and I will actively support with upgrades and new content, and provide "Director's Cut" versions for early supporters, including out takes, special audio, and animations that won't be published to the general audience. At the very least I will give a copy of the game with a thank you note.
 
If I don't reach the funding goal I will use what money I was able to raise and though it will take longer, fund the difference out of pocket to get version 1 out and hopefully gain enough interest and revenue from downloads to improve it and fund new content.

The Impact

I really want to see this game series out there because of the focus on story and the players' unique moves of developing the character and game experience. I like this kind of game. Every choice informs future events ultimately weaving a personal experience while staying true to the over all story arc, kind of like "a choose your own adventure rpg" from back in the day but with all the media and features I've come to expect from a modern piece of software. I want to tell a great story in a new way with unique replayability.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please keep up on the game's latest developments and support text heavy games in general. They are good for the mind :) Also If you know someone who likes the horror genre, please tell them about my project!
 
Thanks alot!!!!
