story:
Download playable prototype here and make sure to vote for the game on Steam Greenlight.


 





    Hello to you from Funtraum Games!  Funtraum Games is me, a game developer from Germany, that country famous for its video game simulations, strategy games and building games. I’ve been workingfor five years in the video game industry before I decided to go full indie with my very own project Build&Battle.



    Build&Battle is a turn-based tower-defense game that plays like a classic strategy game. It is an accessible strategy game that encourages meaningful tactical decisions. For nine months I’ve been working on this project and currently it can even be greenlit on Steam. I want fans of strategy and tower-defense games alike to enjoy Build&Battle and its unique gameplay mix. And for this I need your help.

    Build&Battle will be available for PC,Linux and Mac.

                                                   

    Frogmen with a club: "I hit things good."



    Looking on what has been drawn/coded/composed so far, I will need five more months to make this game the strategy game I imagine it to be. In order to cover the development costs I need to raise 6,000$. 

    Without the full amount, i will only continue to work on this project in my spare time. So if reaching funding goal fails, i will offer you the choice to get all of your money back or receive a smaller version of the game at the end of march.


    This is why I’m turning to my supporters who love strategy and tower-defense just as much as I do. In exchange for your support you will get the game for a discount price compared to what it would cost when released on steam. (For more details check perks)


    Your contribution will help me to create a very unique tower-defense experience for everyone who enjoys a challenge. Furthermore I will be able to finish the game I always wanted to do and whose mechanics and rules are on my mind day and night. I want to thank everyone who decides to support me and hope that everybody will sooner or later enjoy the unique mix of tower-defense and strategy games I will bring to your PC. 


    You build structures, harvest resources, upgrade buildings, train units, research technologies and fight approaching enemies.


    The core idea is to create an easy accessible strategy game that focuses more on the decision making rather than the micromanagement. This is why Build&Battle has become a turn based tower-defense, with every turn unfolding the sum of all your strategic decisions.


    In every turn you gain resources from woodcutters or masons and spend it for placing new towers, training units and researching tech. You plan what your towers and units will do and end the turn to see the effects of all your orders unfold. Watch a gameplay video of an early prototype here:


                                    

    Quapp: "I just want to watch the world burn."

    Elemental Orbs

    Fire, Ice, Wind and Earth

    A very important mechanic that makes the game more complex are the element orbs found in temples. They can be combined to create a wide array of different attacks.


    "Endless possibilites you say?"
    All around the map elemental orbs are hidden in temples which the player can find. These can be applied to any tower, modifying its damage type, amount, range and so on. There are four orb slots for every tower and it plays a bit like in magicka. Use these elements within a tower to specialize it with elemental advantages, combine the orbs to mix elements and create even new elements!

                                     

    Dying Quapp: "Nevermind."

    Buildings

    A collection of some building sprites with their upgrades.



                               

    Dancing-Donkey: "IIIHH - AAAH!"


    Each setting has its own worldmap, wich is reachable from one central hub level.

    The worldmaps and general settings are: Swamp/ Jungle; Dead Forest; Necropolis; Desert Land; Demon World. A linear story will be your path through this worldmaps and keep you going until the last level is successfully cleared.


    Within the worldmaps there are several levels that can be played in a nonlinear order. Each level unlocks technologies and upgrades and helps you to progress through the levels.

    Upgrades and towers you just unlocked will help you making the choice on where and how to strike next.


                                   

    Dying Frog-men guy: "Better take a nap."


    The story is not transported with long texts or mission briefings that the player has to go through, but will be delivered by strong visuals that tell the player about the world and what may happened there.
    Short ingame cutscenes will help the plot to thrive.
    A magical medieval themed world protects itself from unkown evil with the power of the crystal. Nobody really understands its powers, but it sustained peace and prosperity since ancient times and people pray to the crystal.
    The players story starts with the events shown in the trailer. The crystals got weaker and finally cracked, the protection is lost, but a portal to a new mysterious world offers new opportunities to restore the crystals power.


    Core Features (Base Version)

    • Single Player Campaign
      Play through five non-linear worldmaps with about 10 levels each. (Approx. 30-50 hours gameplay)
    • Structures and Units
      6 Towers, 3-6 upgrades each
      (Wall, Wall-Tower, Scout-Tower, Catapult, Canon, Ballista)
      6 Buildings, 3-4 upgrades each
      (Barracks, Shooting Range, Outpost, Woodcutter, Mason, Iron Smeltery)
      2 Units, 6-8 upgrades each
      (Footmen and Archer)
    • Elemental Magic Orbs
      Fire, Ice, Wind and Earth to combine and create a large variety of tactics
    • 5 Boss enemies, one for each worldmap. (Acquire perk to include your ideas!)



    What kind of game related crowd funding campaign would this be without stretch goals? I have to say, that I don’t intend to make the project bigger that I already planned to do. I want to focus on finishing Build&Battle as soon as possible, but of course I have some ideas that would add even more value to the game.


    With the first stretch goal the base version of the game will be expanded to give the player more options for building and combat phases and increase the strategic potentials of the game.



    Stretch Goal 2 is meant to make Build&Battle a full strategy game that can stand its ground against the big ones.

    While this stretch goal doubles the amount of work that has to be done, I it will only add two more months of work on top of the release date since I will hire additional manpower to finish the game.


    Development Roadmap



    Where does the money go?

    6000$ are not much money for game development nowadays, but i work alone and i mainly need to cover my low living expenses:



    "The garage company"

    As I already mentioned, I am a German independent game developer that is living the dream of making a game single handed while living at the brink of poverty. This is also why 6,000$ are enough money for me to finish the project, I work alone and I don’t have much expenses thanks to my good Samaritan parents.

    "Why a turn-based tower defense?"

    I always loved strategy games and I wanted to make a game that offers a wide variety of strategic choices within a complex system, but is easy to understand and interact with. That is why I started to make a more complex tower defense that plays like a classic rts, but all turn based to take out the stress factor of micro management and focus more on the decision making.



    • The Concept
      was always risky, because combining tower defense with turn based sounds like adding boring to boring. A Tower defense game can easily become underwhelming and repetitive and combing this with turn based gaming can make the game very slow and tedious.
      That is when i discovered that i have to put a high focus on level design. Each level has to play differently teaching you something new every time, almost like a puzzle-solving game. And second of all there has to be constant threat, imminent danger and lot of attackers to avoid meaningless turns.

    • Single Man Army
      is what i could call myself. Going alone at a project is usually insane and a bad business decision. Specialization is the key and suddenly you have to be the coder, artist, game designer, level designer, marketing guy and clever business man (Oh and where is the sound and trailer guy?). I focus on design, code and art in this order, i can pull it off pretty good and i am improving every day, but the key to work as a single man army is pretty much just self-discipline. (Also i get help with the sound.. )

    • To small, to much competition
      is the risk that concludes from both the challenges above. Working alone limits the size of the projects and a small tower defense game can be found as a flash-game in the internet as easy as searching for cat pictures.
      So the concept was that i wanted to create an easy accessible strategy game with deep tactical decision making. The size of the project grew to differ from other tower-defense games and become something unique. So now i need help to get towards the finish line.

    • Flexible money goal,
      is what i have chosen for this campaign. By now i regret that i have chosen this type of funding, but i offer you the following, as stated in the "Goals" chapter.
      If i don't reach the full 6,000$ goal, i will continue to work on this project in my spare time and you will receive a smaller version of the game by the end of march. If you dislike that i offer you the choice to get your money back.

      How to support Build&Battle without giving money?

      If you wan't to help me, but you don't wan't to buy the game or have no money to spend, maybe a friend of yours is a crazy tower defense/ strategy/ turn based maniac that needs to know about this project. Sharing is caring!
story_txt:
Download playable prototype here and make sure to vote for the game on Steam Greenlight.

 







Hello to
you from Funtraum Games!  Funtraum Games
is me, a game developer from Germany, that country famous for its video game
simulations, strategy games and building games. I’ve been workingfor five years
in the video game industry before I decided to go full indie with my very own
project Build&Battle.








Build&Battle
is a turn-based tower-defense game that plays like a classic strategy game. It
is an accessible strategy game that encourages meaningful tactical decisions. For
nine months I’ve been working on this project and currently it can even be
greenlit on Steam. I want fans of strategy and tower-defense games alike to
enjoy Build&Battle and its unique gameplay mix. And for this I need your
help.
Build&Battle will be available for PC,Linux and Mac.


                                               
Frogmen with a club: "I hit things good."








Looking on
what has been drawn/coded/composed so far, I will need five more months to make
this game the strategy game I imagine it to be. In order to cover the
development costs I need to raise 6,000$. 
Without the full amount, i will only continue to work on this project in my spare time. So if reaching funding goal fails, i will offer you the choice to get all of your money back or receive a smaller version of the game at the end of march.



This is why
I’m turning to my supporters who love strategy and tower-defense just as much
as I do. In exchange for your support you will get the game for a discount
price compared to what it would cost when released on steam. (For more details
check perks)

Your
contribution will help me to create a very unique tower-defense experience for
everyone who enjoys a challenge. Furthermore I will be able to finish the game
I always wanted to do and whose mechanics and rules are on my mind day and
night. I want to thank everyone who decides to support me and hope that everybody
will sooner or later enjoy the unique mix of tower-defense and strategy games I
will bring to your PC. 












You build
structures, harvest resources, upgrade buildings, train units, research
technologies and fight approaching enemies.

The core
idea is to create an easy accessible strategy game that focuses more on the
decision making rather than the micromanagement. This is why Build&Battle
has become a turn based tower-defense, with every turn unfolding the sum of all
your strategic decisions.

In every
turn you gain resources from woodcutters or masons and spend it for placing new
towers, training units and researching tech. You plan what your towers and
units will do and end the turn to see the effects of all your orders unfold. Watch
a gameplay video of an early prototype here:



                                
Quapp: "I just want to watch the world burn."

Elemental Orbs
Fire, Ice, Wind and Earth
A very important mechanic that makes the game more complex are the element orbs found in temples. They can be combined to create a wide array of different attacks.




"Endless possibilites you say?"
All
around the map elemental orbs are hidden in temples which the player can find. These
can be applied to any tower, modifying its damage type, amount, range and so
on. There are four orb slots for every tower and it plays a bit like in
magicka. Use these elements within a tower to specialize it with elemental
advantages, combine the orbs to mix elements and create even new elements!



                                 
Dying Quapp: "Nevermind."

Buildings
A collection of some building sprites with their upgrades.















                           
Dancing-Donkey: "IIIHH - AAAH!"





Each setting has its own worldmap, wich is reachable from one central hub level.


The worldmaps and general settings are: Swamp/ Jungle; Dead Forest; Necropolis; Desert Land; Demon World. A
linear story will be your path through this worldmaps and keep you going until
the last level is successfully cleared.



Within the
worldmaps there are several levels that can be played in a nonlinear order.
Each level unlocks technologies and upgrades and helps you to progress through
the levels.
Upgrades
and towers you just unlocked will help you making the choice on where and how to
strike next.


                               
Dying Frog-men guy: "Better take a nap."



The story is not transported with long texts or mission briefings that the player has to go through, but will be delivered by strong visuals that tell the player about the world and what may happened there.
Short ingame cutscenes will help the plot to thrive.
A magical medieval themed world protects itself from unkown evil with the power of the crystal. Nobody really understands its powers, but it sustained peace and prosperity since ancient times and people pray to the crystal.
The players story starts with the events shown in the trailer. The crystals got weaker and finally cracked, the protection is lost, but a portal to a new mysterious world offers new opportunities to restore the crystals power.



Core Features (Base Version)


Single Player CampaignPlay through five non-linear worldmaps with about 10 levels each. (Approx. 30-50 hours gameplay)
Structures and Units6 Towers, 3-6 upgrades each(Wall, Wall-Tower, Scout-Tower, Catapult, Canon, Ballista)6 Buildings, 3-4 upgrades each(Barracks, Shooting Range, Outpost, Woodcutter, Mason, Iron Smeltery)2 Units, 6-8 upgrades each(Footmen and Archer)
Elemental Magic OrbsFire, Ice, Wind and Earth to combine and create a large variety of tactics
5 Boss enemies, one for each worldmap. (Acquire perk to include your ideas!)








What kind of game related crowd funding campaign would this be without stretch goals? I have to say, that I don’t intend to make the project bigger that I already planned to do. I want to focus on finishing Build&Battle as soon as possible, but of course I have some ideas that would add even more value to the game.










With
the first stretch goal the base version of the game will be expanded to give
the player more options for building and combat phases and increase the strategic
potentials of the game.










Stretch
Goal 2 is meant to make Build&Battle a full strategy game that can stand
its ground against the big ones.



While this
stretch goal doubles the amount of work that has to be done, I it will only add
two more months of work on top of the release date since I will hire additional manpower
to finish the game.




Development Roadmap









Where does the money go?
6000$ are not much money for game development nowadays, but i work alone and i mainly need to cover my low living expenses:








  


"The garage company"
As
I already mentioned, I am a German independent game developer that is living
the dream of making a game single handed while living at the brink of poverty.
This is also why 6,000$ are enough money for me to finish the project, I work
alone and I don’t have much expenses thanks to my good Samaritan parents.
"Why a turn-based tower defense?"

I always
loved strategy games and I wanted to make a game that offers a wide variety of
strategic choices within a complex system, but is easy to understand and
interact with. That is why I started to make a more complex tower defense that
plays like a classic rts, but all turn based to take out the stress factor of
micro management and focus more on the decision making.



  



The Conceptwas always risky, because combining tower defense with turn based sounds like adding boring to boring. A Tower defense game can easily become underwhelming and repetitive and combing this with turn based gaming can make the game very slow and tedious.That is when i discovered that i have to put a high focus on level design. Each level has to play differently teaching you something new every time, almost like a puzzle-solving game. And second of all there has to be constant threat, imminent danger and lot of attackers to avoid meaningless turns.

Single Man Armyis what i could call myself. Going alone at a project is usually insane and a bad business decision. Specialization is the key and suddenly you have to be the coder, artist, game designer, level designer, marketing guy and clever business man (Oh and where is the sound and trailer guy?). I focus on design, code and art in this order, i can pull it off pretty good and i am improving every day, but the key to work as a single man army is pretty much just self-discipline. (Also i get help with the sound.. )

To small, to much competitionis the risk that concludes from both the challenges above. Working alone limits the size of the projects and a small tower defense game can be found as a flash-game in the internet as easy as searching for cat pictures.So the concept was that i wanted to create an easy accessible strategy game with deep tactical decision making. The size of the project grew to differ from other tower-defense games and become something unique. So now i need help to get towards the finish line.

Flexible money goal,is what i have chosen for this campaign. By now i regret that i have chosen this type of funding, but i offer you the following, as stated in the "Goals" chapter.If i don't reach the full 6,000$ goal, i will continue to work on this project in my spare time and you will receive a smaller version of the game by the end of march. If you dislike that i offer you the choice to get your money back.




  How to support Build&Battle without giving money?
If you wan't to help me, but you don't wan't to buy the game or have no money to spend, maybe a friend of yours is a crazy tower defense/ strategy/ turn based maniac that needs to know about this project. Sharing is caring!

story:
Virtue Esports was a dream to me at one point. I say that in the past-tense, simply because it is no longer just a dream, a figment of imagination so to speak... It's a realistic goal, an ambition, a task I set out to accomplish.


*Introduction*
My name is Ra'Jai Nahiem. I am known, through my friends and current following online, as 'The Logolept' or 'Logo.' What I aspire to be is a Professional Gamer and Live Streamer with an active role in the competitive gaming community through my efforts and the efforts of my organization, "Virtue Esports."

I don't expect to simply reach out for the money to man-power my way straight to owning some company or gaming organization. No, that'd be rather obnoxious. I will work for those things, do research and learn every step of my way there.

However, with responsibilities weighing in on me, college debt, and having a portion of my time taken away by work; I simply can't afford to put away a handful of what little I earn to purchase a high-quality machine for achieving this dream while maintaining my responsibilities, and finding time to practice in order to keep up with my competitors.

*Purpose*

The purpose of this campaign is to help jumpstart the process of establishing myself as a prominent figure in the gaming community by obtaining the one tool that will wholly enable me to use my skills. Without the proper tools, no position can fulfill its role correct? No chef without ingredients, no lawyer without a case and supporting arguments for a stance, no doctor without utilities for diagnosing or treating a patient. No Professional Gamer without a Multi-Media capable computer that is at the least capable of producing content to viewers.

With the money raised through this fundraiser campaign, I can purchase a good machine that will allow me to successfully compete to the best of my capabilities; render, edit, and record videos to promote myself and my talent; establish a platform for sponsorship; stream, and furthermore I can trust that I have a dependable platform for which to build my career from.

Currently, I only own a run-down laptop that is (quite literally) falling apart on me. It doesn't have the necessary hardware to keep me on par with my competition, and on occasion it will even die on me mid-play, or will run too hot. Simply put, it's time I stop ignoring that I can't continue on this way.

*What Exactly Am I Contributing To?*

You are, essentially, contributing to setting the foundation from which I am to grow my organization and myself as an entity in the gaming industry. With your assistance, I effectively reach a point in my journey where I can effectively begin to make a much more direct impact on how competitors and companies will view me and my organization by contributing quality content to viewers and displaying my talents.

By donating, you are also assisting me in overcoming an adversity that would otherwise halt my success for a hefty time period. It goes without saying that I would greatly appreciate the donation, but many will wonder why they should invest - how can you be certain there is any success to be had?

Well, there are quite a few reasons: Did you know that gaming is a billion dollar industry with prize pools for events ranging from thousands to millions of dollars? Did you know that a successful streamer can make upwards of $100,000/yr and more if consistent and sponsored? If you have your doubts, feel free to do some research. Here are a couple of articles to get you started:

* http://www.forbes.com/sites/cameronkeng/2014/04...

* http://gamebeyond.com/how-much-do-twitch-stream...

My reason for choosing Professional Gaming is simple. It's what I'm passionate about. I love competition, I thrive on having a mental challenge and applying various skills in a way that is both variable and entertaining while requiring coordination and communication. Video games, for me, are more than just a hobby to dabble in casually. I seek to be at the top, to be the greatest possible competitor I can be. I appreciate and respect every professional out there who has honed their craft (whatever craft that may be), and look to them daily in inspiration. This is my craft. I aspire to be recognized for it. Your assistance in reaching that point would mean a world and more to me.

story:
Our Campaign

Our team at Piko Interactive concentrates in the development and production of new videos games for old consoles. In addition, we "rescue" video games that did not see the light, or were exclusive to a particular region by officially acquiring the rights to publish them, and giving them a proper release.  

We are now excited to finally bring Iron Commando and LEGEND to gamers everywhere!

Arcade Zone (now Hyperdevbox) sold us the full rights to Iron Commando and LEGEND, so we can localize and release NTSC and PAL versions of these great games for the SNES fans in the rest of the world.

While we have produced a very limited amount of copies of Iron Commando for our online Store fans (less than 100), we are ready to bring this great game as well as LEGEND to the masses! We believe these games should be played by anyone that still owns a classic console, and that is why we have chosen IndieGogo to be the platform to help us achieve that.

 


 

What if I don't have a SNES?

if you don't have a SNES Console and still want to play, we have a few options for you! You can pledge for the PC download key (Steam Key download) which will provide you a download code for Iron Commando or Legend. Then, you will be able to install the game on your PC; games offer USB controller support, so it would be as if you are playing it on a console. 

We also have a couple of perks which will offer the option to acquire a clone console; either a TV console or a handheld SNES console (Retroduo portable to play on the go!). Both allow you to pick Iron Commando or Legend to be bundled in.

TV Console Model Subject to Change - RetroDuo Portable Color Subject to Change

RetroDuo Bundle Edition 

SNES Clone IC Edition Official look.

 

Production

The game carts will be assembled in the US, and the boards will be soldered by hand in our shop. The PCB will be region free, however we will have options for PAL console owners to pick PAL style game cartridges. We have the packaging ready to go (Box, Manuals, and Labels). This campaign will help us know the demand from the retro gaming community, so fulfilling rewards will be just a matter of ordering components, assembling and shipping!

In 1995, Iron Commando, a Japan exclusive Beat’em up, was released for the SNES. Currently, the game is one of the most expensive for Super Famicom in the second-hand markets, and can pass a $400 value for the version that still includes the original packaging.

Game Story

Take control of either Jake, a soldier, or Chang Li, a martial arts master, in your quest to stop G.H.O.S.T. from capturing a radioactive meteorite. 

10 levels of brawling action with many unique experiences such as riding in a Jeep, mine cart and even a motorcycle. 2 player simultaneous play, stereo sound plus new experiences never experienced in a brawling game before. Punch, kick, shoot and beat your way through the G.H.O.S.T. thugs to get that meteorite back for the good guys.

 

 

LEGEND, released in 1994 and also for the SNES, is a Beat’em Up with a fantasy setting, featuring a co-op 2-player campaign, boss fights, and awesome 16-bit graphics. Almost impossible to find, a second-hand cartridge of LEGEND can pass for over $100 in costs.

Game Story

Beldor the Maleficent reigned as a despot over the kingdom of Sellech for one thousand years. All was chaos and destruction. Many knights went on a final crusade to destroy Beldor but none returned. The people united, built energized heroes and imprisoned Beldor's soul. Now, Clovis, corrupt son of the King of Sellech, wants to harness Beldor's power and conquer the kingdom.

 

 

 

 

 

 

About Piko Interactive

Piko Interactive was founded in 2013 thanks to a crowdfunding campaign for a new snes indie cart. The cart consisted in a compilation of 4 different mini games for SNES. That project was successfully founded and was a setting stone for Piko. From then on, Piko concentrated in finding new projects to bring to older consoles; we have been able to rescue over 20 different titles from being forgotten. These include Unreleased and Unfinished games, Chinese/Japanese exclusive games, and European exclusive games.

Here are some of the successful projects we have done in the past:

Super 4 in 1 Multicart                    

 

 

Super 3D Noah's Ark Reprint

 

Dorke and Ymp (SNES)

 
Water Margin - The Tale of Clouds and Wind (Sega Genesis)
 


Custodian (Atari Jaguar)

story:
Do you have the courage to save the world?

True Infinity is a new, classic 8-bit RPG in the style of Final Fantasy and Dragon Warrior.  Journey with companions, fight monsters, and explore as you quest to save the world from an evil extraterrestrial threat!

True Infinity features an open-world game style, like those featured in Skyrim or Assassin's Creed: play the main quest and/or play the multitude of side quests that you'll find on your adventure.  True Infinity also features a character creator and customize-able and upgrade-able equipment.

What does the money go to?

The money you pledge will go to hiring additional artists, and possibly a composer, to help finish True Infinity by next May.

What platforms will it be available for?

True Infinity will be available at launch for PC, Mac, and Linux.  There is a possibility of a later release on iOS or Android, but I will be focusing on the those three platforms at launch.

Are there any stretch goals?

There are!  

  • $4000 - I will add randomly generated quests and dungeons, so that way the fun never stops.
  • $5000 - I will add an additional epilogue story-line that picks up where the main quest ends.

story:
UPDATE: Even if we do not reach our goal, we will provide a working demo to all of our contributors! Thanks for your support.

 

Shooteria is a 3D game designed to promote IPSC shooting worldwide. We did develop a game in which a player is able to shoot various stages from different matches and compete online with other players, by using the IPSC scoring system. We need your help to publish our Trial version and keep working to extend it to reach our final goal which is a multiplayer game.

It may your target be in the stage, but our target is to offer you a fully functionable game in which you will be a able to spend nice moments with your friends and shooters worldwide. We want to create a 3D shooting world in a multiplayer environment in which each shooter will grow his skills from the beginning, earn money, buy new guns and ammo, customize his gun and generally interact with other players (chat, shootoffs, exchange items, drink coffee, etc.)

Help us to make our shooting world for our favourite sport by contributing in this campaign!

Our first involvement with IPSC shooting starts around 1999, in which we got our first experience in shooting with pistols. As IPSC Lovers (!!!) we spent a lot of hours in the shooting range to improve our skills and we did participate in many seminars related with IPSC shooting. We got a deep experience in this sport not only in knowledge related with training but also in gunsmithing and range officials. In 2005, we did create the first online shooting community in Greece called “Shooters”, in which our goal was to make an online place for daily discussions in shooting related issues. Since then, the “Shooters” hosts more than 2.500 Greek shooters and more than 60.000 posts. In 2010, we launched a bi-monthly unique and high-qualitative magazine publication, dedicated to IPSC shooting in Greece. One year later, in cooperation with one of the world most famous company “Double Alpha Academy - DAA”, we did launch the “WorldShootPhotos” project in which we did provide digital photos to shooters during the World Shoot event in Rhodes. As soon as the World Shoot in Rhodes was over, we came up with the “Shooteria” idea in which now we ask for your help to make it happen.

Our studies in computing gave us the opportunity to start thinking a way on how we can use our skills in programming to promote this lovely sport. We came up with this idea, in which every shooter from all over the world will be able to have fun when he is away from the shooting range. This is not only a game, it can be a very useful tool for everyone who wants to improve his skills in IPSC shooting.

We are excited with this idea, and we hope you get excited too. The Trial version of Shooteria is almost ready. We did the major work and we did implement some basic graphics and core programming. We need your help to get it further...

If you want to help us by contributing in this project, please choose one of the available perks and just leave the hard work to us.

You may use it as a game and you get the following features:

  • Compete among shooters from all over the world
  • Select your team and reach to the top
  • Improve your character skills and make achievements
  • Realistic 3D graphics, live weather conditions
  • Customize your character, choose your gun, make gunsmithing works
  • Train your character in the most popular shooting ranges in the world
  • Socialize with shooting community through our multiplayer environment
  • Challenge a friend for a duel in a head-to-head shoot-off shooting

You may use it as a tool by using the following features:

  • Use your own gun to improve yourself (special equipment to connect your real gun)
  • Dry shooting in real conditions
  • Improve your stage analysis ability (find the best way to shoot a stage)
  • Walkthrough through stages of real upcoming matches
  • Train your shooting behavior in realistic physics environment (ex. Classic Popper fall simulation according with the shooting accuracy)

Our trial version is going to cover a very basic set of features and we need your contribution to make it available online. On the other hand, a successful campaign will give us the necessary feedback to continue working in this project and add more cool features.

Trial Version

This is going to be our very first version of the game. This is almost ready and we hope that our campaign will be successful to make it available online. 

In our trial version we are going to cover the following features:

  • Realistic 3D graphics / live weather conditions (day/night, rain, snow)
  • A dedicated stage for tutorial purposes
  • One trial match with 10 stages
  • IPSC Handgun shooter with a simple pistol
  • IPSC scoring system - stage results - overall results
  • Choose a default team or one of the teams that Team Leaders created

We need a successful campaign to cover the costs for:

  • Commercial licenses
  • One year hosting
  • Design new 3D objects/improve graphics

Available: Immediately after a successful campaign

 

As you may already have mentioned, this is going to be a new generation for online advertising as you will be able to promote your products effectively in a huge shooting community, worldwide. We give you briefly some ways of advertising in the game. You may use one of the perks (Advertiser, Stage Sponsor, Match Sponsor)  to have an in-game advertisement, like those banners in huge IPSC matches.

Advertiser: If you want to hire a banner for a stage in our trial match and in the first available main match, then this is the best perk for you. You may choose to send us a banner of your choice or let our team to design one for you. The banner design is going to be free of charge. 
Stage Sponsor: If your company has a wide variety of products or services, then a stage in Shooteria is ready to host them. You may choose to send us up to six banners to include in a stage of your choice. If you do not have the banners, our team will design them for you free of charge. Your banners will be available in our trial match and in the first available main match in the game.
Match Sponsor: This the best way to promote your company and your products or services. We will include your company logo in every corner in our trial match and in our first available main match. You will be a able to design all the stages for this match as you want and in the way that they promote your business. You may also use up to 60 banners to promote your business in each stage of both two matches.

8.500+ Euro - Support all the IPSC disciplines: Shooteria currently covers only the handgun discipline, but we plan to cover in the future both shotgun and rifle matches.
13.000+ Euro - Guns: As we currently cover only one model of a gun, we plan to design various models of pistols, revolvers, shotguns and rifles.
18.000+ Euro - Gunsmithing: What if you will be able in the future to improve the accuracy of your gun by replacing gun parts (like barrel, recoil spring, etc.)? We plan to give you anything you need to make your own custom gun and improve various aspects of its specs.
22.500+ Euro - Training: As the real life, training is the most important factor to improve your skills in shooting. We will provide plenty of training scenarios to improve your game character skills such as accuracy, double-tap, acceleration, speed, reloading, etc. You will be able to train yourself, discover new techniques in the game and use them during the gameplay to earn advantages in a stage.
28.000+ Euro - Shoot-Offs: This is going to be one of the best parts in this game. Shooters from all over the world will be able to compete in a head-to-head shootoff according with the IPSC rules. This part is going to be more interested if you use the equipment for your own gun to compete with another shooter who uses his own gun!
35.000+ Euro - Equipment to use your own gun: We did a market research to find out the best solution for you. Within minutes you will be able to connect your real gun with the game. That actually means that you get rid of your mouse and you can use your gun to play the game! This is the best part of this game as it converts it to a very useful tool for training purposes.
48.000 Euro - Multiplayer environment: Imagine a 3D world in which shooters will be able to interact with each other from all over the world. Our 3D world will be based in a huge shooting range in which shooters will be able to train himselves, shoot stages, buy guns and ammo from sponsors, etc.

  • We did the hard work and we got a ready trial
  • We got previous experience in succeed big projects
  • We are specialists in computing with BSc and MSc degrees
  • We are also shooters with huge experience in IPSC matches
  • We got all the necessary resources to reach our final goal

Maybe you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean that you can’t help!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign
  • Use the available sharing tools
  • Contact your friends to help us
story_txt:
UPDATE: Even if we do not reach our goal, we will provide a working demo to all of our contributors! Thanks for your support.
 


Shooteria is a 3D game designed to promote IPSC shooting worldwide. We did develop a game in which a player is able to shoot various stages from different matches and compete online with other players, by using the IPSC scoring system. We need your help to publish our Trial version and keep working to extend it to reach our final goal which is a multiplayer game.
It may your target be in the stage, but our target is to offer you a fully functionable game in which you will be a able to spend nice moments with your friends and shooters worldwide. We want to create a 3D shooting world in a multiplayer environment in which each shooter will grow his skills from the beginning, earn money, buy new guns and ammo, customize his gun and generally interact with other players (chat, shootoffs, exchange items, drink coffee, etc.)
Help us to make our shooting world for our favourite sport by contributing in this campaign!

Our first involvement with IPSC shooting starts around 1999, in which we got our first experience in shooting with pistols. As IPSC Lovers (!!!) we spent a lot of hours in the shooting range to improve our skills and we did participate in many seminars related with IPSC shooting. We got a deep experience in this sport not only in knowledge related with training but also in gunsmithing and range officials. In 2005, we did create the first online shooting community in Greece called “Shooters”, in which our goal was to make an online place for daily discussions in shooting related issues. Since then, the “Shooters” hosts more than 2.500 Greek shooters and more than 60.000 posts. In 2010, we launched a bi-monthly unique and high-qualitative magazine publication, dedicated to IPSC shooting in Greece. One year later, in cooperation with one of the world most famous company “Double Alpha Academy - DAA”, we did launch the “WorldShootPhotos” project in which we did provide digital photos to shooters during the World Shoot event in Rhodes. As soon as the World Shoot in Rhodes was over, we came up with the “Shooteria” idea in which now we ask for your help to make it happen.

Our studies in computing gave us the opportunity to start thinking a way on how we can use our skills in programming to promote this lovely sport. We came up with this idea, in which every shooter from all over the world will be able to have fun when he is away from the shooting range. This is not only a game, it can be a very useful tool for everyone who wants to improve his skills in IPSC shooting.
We are excited with this idea, and we hope you get excited too. The Trial version of Shooteria is almost ready. We did the major work and we did implement some basic graphics and core programming. We need your help to get it further...
If you want to help us by contributing in this project, please choose one of the available perks and just leave the hard work to us.

You may use it as a game and you get the following features:

Compete among shooters from all over the world
Select your team and reach to the top
Improve your character skills and make achievements
Realistic 3D graphics, live weather conditions
Customize your character, choose your gun, make gunsmithing works
Train your character in the most popular shooting ranges in the world
Socialize with shooting community through our multiplayer environment
Challenge a friend for a duel in a head-to-head shoot-off shooting


You may use it as a tool by using the following features:

Use your own gun to improve yourself (special equipment to connect your real gun)
Dry shooting in real conditions
Improve your stage analysis ability (find the best way to shoot a stage)
Walkthrough through stages of real upcoming matches
Train your shooting behavior in realistic physics environment (ex. Classic Popper fall simulation according with the shooting accuracy)




Our trial version is going to cover a very basic set of features and we need your contribution to make it available online. On the other hand, a successful campaign will give us the necessary feedback to continue working in this project and add more cool features.
Trial Version
This is going to be our very first version of the game. This is almost ready and we hope that our campaign will be successful to make it available online. 
In our trial version we are going to cover the following features:

Realistic 3D graphics / live weather conditions (day/night, rain, snow)
A dedicated stage for tutorial purposes
One trial match with 10 stages
IPSC Handgun shooter with a simple pistol
IPSC scoring system - stage results - overall results
Choose a default team or one of the teams that Team Leaders created

We need a successful campaign to cover the costs for:

Commercial licenses
One year hosting
Design new 3D objects/improve graphics

Available: Immediately after a successful campaign
 

As you may already have mentioned, this is going to be a new generation for online advertising as you will be able to promote your products effectively in a huge shooting community, worldwide. Your banners will be available in our trial match and in the first available main match in the game.




Match Sponsor: This the best way to promote your company and your products or services. We will include your company logo in every corner in our trial match and in our first available main match. You will be a able to design all the stages for this match as you want and in the way that they promote your business. You may also use up to 60 banners to promote your business in each stage of both two matches.

13.000+ Euro - Guns: As we currently cover only one model of a gun, we plan to design various models of pistols, revolvers, shotguns and rifles.




18.000+ Euro - Gunsmithing: What if you will be able in the future to improve the accuracy of your gun by replacing gun parts (like barrel, recoil spring, etc.)? We plan to give you anything you need to make your own custom gun and improve various aspects of its specs.

We will provide plenty of training scenarios to improve your game character skills such as accuracy, double-tap, acceleration, speed, reloading, etc. You will be able to train yourself, discover new techniques in the game and use them during the gameplay to earn advantages in a stage.




28.000+ Euro - Shoot-Offs: This is going to be one of the best parts in this game. Shooters from all over the world will be able to compete in a head-to-head shootoff according with the IPSC rules. This part is going to be more interested if you use the equipment for your own gun to compete with another shooter who uses his own gun!

We did the hard work and we got a ready trial

story:
¿Tienes hijos y quieres lo mejor para ellos?

Wikiduca presenta un juego de cartas que potencia su capacidad intelectual.

Esperamos que disfrutes de nuestro juego y de nuestras recompensas:

Puedes confiar en nosotros:

Nuestro primer juego, creado para aprender inglés gratis, se usa en 10 países dentro y fuera del ámbito escolar. Nuestro éxito y nuestra dedicación nos avalan:

Nuestra misión es educar en valores y cada día la vivimos con intensidad.

Trabajamos con niños, padres y maestros para crear los mejores juegos educativos y las historias más cautivadoras para ayudar a educar a los niños:

Entendemos nuestra responsabilidad y la disfrutamos con dedicación y compromiso.

Aunque nadie te lo diga, tus hijos necesitan juegos educativos como el nuevo juego de Wikiduca:

Como padre o madre, seguro que has oído hablar de los juegos de desarrollo cognitivo. Incluso de hijos como los tuyos, que cada día se divierten mientras desarrollan su mente.

Este tipo de juegos existe desde tiempos inmemoriales pero el desarrollo cognitivo, como campo científico, está todavía en su infancia. ¡El primer test de inteligencia no se inventó hasta el siglo pasado!

Aunque todo el mundo sabe que estimular la mente de sus hijos es bueno, pocos REALMENTE conocen el poder de los juegos de desarrollo cognitivo actuales.

¿Estos juegos son para tus hijos?

Sepas lo que sepas (o no sepas) sobre estos juegos, tienes que oír esto:

La ciencia demuestra que parte de la inteligencia es lotería genética, pero los estudios más actuales (Jaeggi) desvelan un secreto desconocido hasta ahora:

La memoria funcional almacena los datos que necesitamos para procesar cualquier acción o pensamiento. ¡Potenciar la memoria funcional aumenta la capacidad intelectual en todas las áreas cognitivas!

¿Y por qué debería importarte? ¡Porque afecta a todo lo que hacemos!

¡Tus hijos necesitan ejercitarla para alcanzar su máximo potencial!

Un hecho sorprendente:

Jaeggi realizó un estudio antes y después de que un grupo de niños ejercitaran su memoria funcional. Era el test de matrices de Raven, que proporciona una buena estimación del coeficiente intelectual.

Antes del ejercicio, el promedio de aciertos era de nueve matrices. Después de unos meses potenciando su memoria funcional…

¡El promedió de aciertos aumentó a trece matrices y media!

¿De verdad se puede potenciar la memoria funcional?

¡Claro que sí! Igual que un músculo, se puede ejercitar. ¡Imagina tener la memoria funcional de un detective, que maneja cientos de pistas en su cabeza para resolver un caso!

¿Pero cómo se hace?

¡Con juegos de desarrollo cognitivo como el juego de cartas de Wikiduca! Hace años que nos dedicamos a los juegos educativos pero nunca hemos encontrado nada más eficaz o emocionante que el desarrollo de la memoria funcional.

¿Y cómo funciona?

Hemos diseñado el juego para adaptarse al nivel de cada jugador y ayudar a desarrollar su máximo potencial.

Los niños deben elaborar estrategias con cartas visibles y no visibles y elegir la mejor jugada. Cuantas más cartas retienen en su cabeza, mejores jugadas pueden hacer.

¡Es un entrenamiento intenso de su memoria funcional!


¿Pero realmente necesito estos juegos para mis hijos? ¿No desarrollan su mente de forma natural?

¡Si, pero estos juegos les permiten alcanzar su máximo potencial! Aún no hemos conocido ningún padre que no quiera lo mejor para sus hijos. ¡Esperamos que siga siendo así!

Para niños de 6 a 12 años:

Wikiduca está diseñado a medida para adaptarse a sus habilidades.

Los mejores juegos son fáciles de aprender pero difíciles de dominar: los niños más pequeños aprenderán a jugar sin problemas, mientras que los mayores disfrutarán de toda la profundidad estratégica.

¿Y tiene aún más beneficios?

Por decir unos pocos:

  • Lógica: los niños potenciarán sus procesos mentales a múltiples niveles a través del pensamiento estratégico.
  • Habilidades sociales: jugar cara a cara con otros niños es de las experiencias más enriquecedoras para el desarrollo social de un niño.
  • Gestión de recursos: ¡los niños aprenderán la importancia de optimizar sus recursos para tener éxito!
  • Negociación: ¡uno de los pilares de la resolución de problemas!
  • Valores: ¡en el centro de Wikiduca están los valores de esfuerzo y superación personal de sus héroes para inspirar a los niños!

Tenemos una misión y necesitamos tu ayuda:

Hemos captado el interés de fuertes editoriales para publicar este juego a gran escala, ¡pero tenemos que demostrarles que lo quieres!

Nuestra misión es reunir 3698€ con tu ayuda para conseguir su respaldo. El dinero será destinado a imprimir nuestra tirada de Navidad.

¡Ayúdanos a demostrar que nuestro juego lo merece y vuestros niños también!

Bonus y recompensas:

Hemos preparado nuestra lista de recompensas con cuidado y cariño:

Riesgos:

¡Ninguno! Nuestras recompensas están listas para enviar.

Agradecimiento y despedida:

No puedes callarte este secreto. ¡Por favor compártelo!

Por CONTRIBUIR a nuestra campaña y COMPARTIR en tus redes sociales, gracias de corazón.

¿Y tiene aún más beneficios?
Por decir unos pocos:



Lógica: los niños potenciarán sus procesos mentales a múltiples niveles a través del pensamiento estratégico.


Habilidades sociales: jugar cara a cara con otros niños es de las experiencias más enriquecedoras para el desarrollo social de un niño.


Gestión de recursos: ¡los niños aprenderán la importancia de optimizar sus recursos para tener éxito!


Negociación: ¡uno de los pilares de la resolución de problemas!


Valores: ¡en el centro de Wikiduca están los valores de esfuerzo y superación personal de sus héroes para inspirar a los niños!


Tenemos una misión y necesitamos tu ayuda:

Hemos captado el interés de fuertes editoriales para publicar este juego a gran escala, ¡pero tenemos que demostrarles que lo quieres!
Nuestra misión es reunir 3698€ con tu ayuda para conseguir su respaldo. El dinero será destinado a imprimir nuestra tirada de Navidad.
¡Ayúdanos a demostrar que nuestro juego lo merece y vuestros niños también!


Bonus y recompensas:
Hemos preparado nuestra lista de recompensas con cuidado y cariño:


















Riesgos:

¡Ninguno! Nuestras recompensas están listas para enviar.


Agradecimiento y despedida:

No puedes callarte este secreto. ¡Por favor compártelo!
Por CONTRIBUIR a nuestra campaña y COMPARTIR en tus redes sociales, gracias de corazón.

story:
About Game Hatchers

Game Hatchers LLC opened its doors on June 28, 2013. We have been working tirelessly to create our first game of many for your enjoyment. Our first game "Tower Elite" is currently for mobile devices and can be downloaded from the Google Play Store.

At Game Hatchers we are extremely passionate about creating great gaming experiences for our players and we hope that you will send us your feedback once you have played our games. We have dedicated an email just for you at playersvoice@gamehatchers.com and we check it regularly.  At Game Hatchers LLC we are player-centered and the players voice carry's weight, so please speak up and be heard.

About our new game "DOMINATION ELITE"!

(ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTATION): Domination Elite is the first game of its kind but, is being created using proven game play principles and mechanics. It is unique in its design because it is the first PvP game where opposing teams can work together to destroy an even deadlier foe, and then dispatch one another! In Domination Elite your primary objective is to dominate the battlefield. There will of course be different modes of game play like (Control, Protect, and of course Domination) which are similar to other PvP FPS games like Battlefield, COD, etc...with their (Capture the Flag, Conquest, and Rush), but the difference is in Dom-Elite you will have "Rainbow Six" and "SOCOM" like control over 2 AI (Bots) along with your player character. A team will consist of you and 4 other players who will each have 2 AI troops under their control. This means a team of 5 "real" players is actually a team of 15 at the beginning of the game.  5 players controlling 3 characters each equals 15 per team. Each game will be a contest between 3 teams instead of just 2 teams battling it out, plus there will be an AI enemy that will be taking no prisoners from either team and itself will be trying to Dominate the playing field!

Each team member has a tower component they're responsible for based on the type of player character they choose (Assault, Engineer, Spec-Op, and Support). Your AI follows point and click preset commands from the your HUD. Your team is tasked with protecting the tower from the enemy while also trying to destroy the enemy's tower. This game will require strategy, cunning, and lots of explosive kick ass running and gunning!

What ever you give we will use! We are by no means to proud to beg and we are begging for your help right now! Just like Battle Field and Call of Duty, Domination Elite can be one of those classics that you recognize just by hearing the name...and you can help us do it! We have a lot of great perks as you can see to the right>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Things like:

Helping test our AI Enemy Intelligence for a truly challenging experience as a Beta Tester!


Exclusive behind the scenes access to help us Plan Upgrades!


Beta Tester-X access to play-test new and (experimental) releases of the game and  Alpha Pre-Release Access (2 months) before any update goes public!


Our goal is set respectfully at $160K and we have plans to put every penny to good use in making Domination Elite a classic title that you can be proud you were a part of bringing into existence. If we just so happen to exceed our goal we will use the excess funds to polish Domination Elite even further. Lastly, if there is a PERK that you would like to see added please use the playersvoice@gamehatchers.com email address and let your voice be heard. Thank you in advance for helping us bring Domination Elite into existence for the world to enjoy!

Your Impact

Currently our goals will be achieved with YOUR HELP as follows....

100,000 - Programming
10,000 - Environment Texturing/Lighting
10,000 - Asset Modeling/Texturing
10,000 - Level Design/Layout
10,000 - Audio Design/Sound FX
10,000 - Perks
5,000 - Motion Capture Character Animations
5,000 - Licensing

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

This means a team of 5 "real" players is actually a team of 15 at the beginning of the game.  5 players controlling 3 characters each equals 15 per team. Each game will be a contest between 3 teams instead of just 2 teams battling it out, plus there will be an AI enemy that will be taking no prisoners from either team and itself will be trying to Dominate the playing field!Each team member has a tower component they're responsible for based on the type of player character they choose (Assault, Engineer, Spec-Op, and Support). Your AI follows point and click preset commands from the your HUD. Your team is tasked with protecting the tower from the enemy while also trying to destroy the enemy's tower. This game will require strategy, cunning, and lots of explosive kick ass running and gunning!What ever you give we will use! We are by no means to proud to beg and we are begging for your help right now! Just like Battle Field and Call of Duty, Domination Elite can be one of those classics that you recognize just by hearing the name...and you can help us do it! We have a lot of great perks as you can see to the right>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Things like:Helping test our AI Enemy Intelligence for a truly challenging experience as a Beta Tester!Exclusive behind the scenes access to help us Plan Upgrades!Beta Tester-X access to play-test new and (experimental) releases of the game and  Alpha Pre-Release Access (2 months) before any update goes public! Our goal is set respectfully at $160K and we have plans to put every penny to good use in making Domination Elite a classic title that you can be proud you were a part of bringing into existence. If we just so happen to exceed our goal we will use the excess funds to polish Domination Elite even further. Lastly, if there is a PERK that you would like to see added please use the playersvoice@gamehatchers.com email address and let your voice be heard. Thank you in advance for helping us bring Domination Elite into existence for the world to enjoy!Your ImpactCurrently our goals will be achieved with YOUR HELP as follows....100,000 - Programming10,000 - Environment Texturing/Lighting10,000 - Asset Modeling/Texturing10,000 - Level Design/Layout10,000 - Audio Design/Sound FX 10,000 - Perks5,000 - Motion Capture Character Animations5,000 - Licensing Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
After Megaman X was activated by Dr. Cain, every robot already known have been upgraded Megaman to Megaman x , Bass to Zero etc. In all this time Protoman as he normally did roamed the world alone, his core one day malfunctioned and he went on a electrical blackout. When he re-activated he found the world completely changed, and he was upgraded, by someone..... His memory wasn’t wiped like that of X’s and Zero's, due to this he went on a journey to find out what was happening only to be targeted as a maverick by his own friends



I began working on this game as a solo developer in 2008 but it wasn't until 2012 when I really got serious did I pull together a team. Despite what many people may think this is not a complete rip of the Megaman X game. 

The development of this game has been very time consuming and takes a great deal of effort, not only to create the game but to instill the same Megaman X gameplay feeling into each level. 




Currently we are working on having the game be available to you for 2 different systems, SNES and Computer (Flash). 



The game is still in alpha state, but with your support  the game could be released sooner.




Joey Ladner 

(Creator, Web Master, 
Lead program designer, Asm Programmer, Game Developer)



Nio

(Spriter, Artist)





Sinned Knight 

(Music Composer)




Luciano Ciccariello

(Snes Game Editor Creator And Programmer)




Sam Webster 

(Concept Art)



Alex Semenov

(Flash Development)






So far the SNES version is near completion and is planned to be completed on February 21, 2014. Here is a small sample of the first level for the SNES version:





Here are some screenshots of other levels:




The flash version of the game is still under development but our developer is hammering away like a machine, perhaps we will have a release date sometime in the near future.




Here we have some concept art for the bosses and characters:








Why We need the Money


Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Licensing fees for Capcom
  • Voice actors
  • Original Music
  • More Programmers
  • $980 on those 150 box perk
  • each cart cost's $60
  • The Comics are $150 comics because there is 15 in each big box




$60 - Protoman 21XX Cartridge ONLY


$80 - Box like good old days, cartridge, instruction manual, paper tray and poster.




$200 - Previous perks included, The Pc Game in dvd box, 9 Comics from 21XX origins (explain why bosses became haywire), ONE LIMITED EDITION TO THIS BOX of Protoman 21XX comic explaining how he got into this mess, sound track & artbook.

story:
Bonjour à tous,

Je m'appelle Alain Truffier (Alias Angelstar) et je suis le créateur de plusieurs jeux en ligne dont 650km.com et Druidik.com.

J'ai fondé mon entreprise "Les mots dits Français" pour permettre aux milliers de joueurs en ligne de profiter de nouveaux concepts, add-on et animations au sein de mes jeux.
Ce projet de financement INDIEGOGO est le début d'une série qui me permettra d'améliorer l'activité ludo-éducative du jeu "650km.com perdu dans l'océan" tout en permettant à tous les joueurs de profiter du thème du jeu, le dépaysement total !

 

POURQUOI J'AI BESOIN DE VOUS ET QU'Y GAGNEZ-VOUS?


Ce premier projet INDIEGOGO consiste à financer la mise en place d'un système de concours pour le jeu gratuit 650km.com où plus de 500 000 joueurs s'amusent gratuitement à vivre des aventures palpitantes depuis 2006; ce concours permettra d'offrir des lots de voyages réels aux gagnants!

Grâce au financement de ce projet, je pourrais lancer le concours entre le 15 Juillet et le 15 Aout 2013, ce qui permettra à tout le monde d'avoir sa chance de gagner d'autres vacances au soleil!

Si vous n'êtes pas joueur :
Pas de problème ici, ce projet pourra vous intérresser car tout contributeur aura un gain et en tant que nouvel inscrit vous aurez autant de chance d'obtenir un lot que les autres.

Croyez les milliers de joueurs actuels, vous passerez du bon temps à jouer gratuitement à 650km et à rejoindre cette grande communauté de joueurs francophones.
Que vous soyez un joueur vétéran ou nouvellement inscrit, vous aurez la chance de participer à ce concours (sans obligation d'achat) et de gagner des vacances de rêve tout en vous amusant!

Le jeu a déjà profité de nombreuses mises à jour et l'une des dernières a été la mise en place d'un système de concours où les joueurs peuvent, en effectuant quelques actions, gagner des lots collectors ou rares.

Les joueurs vivent virtuellement sur une archipel paradisiaque (ou presque!), alors pourquoi pas faire se rejoindre la réalité à la virtualité et LES faire partir sur une île réelle pour des vacances de rêve !

Chaque contribution que vous ferez me permettra de mettre en place tout le concours (graphismes et développement) et de vous proposer des lots et des voyages de meilleures qualités.

 

QUEL SERA LE CONCOURS ET LES LOTS QUE VOUS GAGNEREZ

 

Les règles du concours qui sera lancé entre le 15 Juillet et le 15 Aout seront :

Jouez à 650km.com et cumulez l'objet "COQUILLAGE DORE" en utilisant l'action
"TROUVER DES VACANCES" sur l'environnement "PLAGE" ou en faisant des
échanges d'objets sur différents environnement du jeu. Plus vous en
cumulez et plus vous grimpez dans le classement !

1 "COQUILLAGE DORE" vaut 5 POINTS.

OU Achetez directement 100 COQUILLAGES DORES pour seulement 150 KM-POINTS et montez de 500 points!

Les 2000 premiers joueurs du classement auront des lots distribués selon 6 paliers suivants :

1er : Le voyage de votre choix pour une valeur de 3000$

2e >> 20e : 2 arbres à guarana (fournissent 2 graines de guarana chaque jours!)

21e >> 50e : 1 épée magnétique

50e >> 300e : 1 boite de 20 sachet de thé

301e >> 1000e : 200 points d'aventures

1001e >> 2000e : 3 sachet de thé



A QUOI SERVIRA VOTRE CONTRIBUTION?

 

Afin de produire les parties graphiques et techniques du concours, nous avons besoin de 1000$,

Cela nous permettra de créer toutes les actions, objets et interactions nécessaires.


500$ serviront à rembourser les intervenants

Ceux qui ont déjà travaillé sur la mise en place de ce projet sur Indiegogo (graphiste, correcteur, commercial).


Nous réservons 500$ de budget marketing

Afin de lancer les lettres d'information, le relai des sites partenaires ainsi que les annonces sur les réseaux sociaux.


Un budget de 3000$ est donc alloué pour l'achat du voyage 

Vous partirez à la date qu'il vous convient et pour la destination que vous souhaitez.

Que vous désirez partir dans le Jura, en Estrie ou partout dans le monde, seul, entre amis, en famille ou en amoureux, nous communiquerons ensemble afin de planifier vos vacances (à hauteur de 3000$ maximum).


Le cahier des charges consiste à créer les graphismes et le développement des actions et objets suivants :

* La création du concours, son règlement, son fonctionnement, le système de distribution des lots.
* 1 série d'icônes de l'objet "coquillage doré"
* 27 séries d'icônes permettant les échanges de ressources naturelles récoltées dans le jeu contre des "coquillages dorés".

Voici le détail de ces actions sur les environnements prévus :


5 cristaux verts pour 1 coquillage doré
500 fruits et légumes pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 coquillages pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 poissons pour 5 coquillages doré
500 viandes pour 5 coquillages dorés
500 tissus pour 2 coquillages dorés



500 feuilles pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 os pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 bois pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 tôles pour 5 coquillages dorés
500 pierres pour 2 coquillages dorés
500 silex pour 5 coquillage dorés


100 soufres pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 salpêtres pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 houilles pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 opales pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 quartz pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 verts à sable pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 cuivres pour 5 coquillages dorés


100 plombs pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 magnétites pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 grès pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 fers pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 argiles pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 zincs à sable pour 5 coquillages doré
100 obsidiennes pour 5 coquillages dorés
100 lapis lazuli pour 5 coquillages dorés


POUR CHAQUE CONTRIBUTION VOUS RECEVREZ DES LOTS!

Chaque contribution que vous ferez vous permettra d'avoir une quantité variable de coquillages dorés et donc une avancée significative dans le classement.

En fonction de votre niveau de contribution sur Indiegogo vous pourrez obtenir des objets COLLECTOR, des POINTS d'AVENTURES (qui s'échangent contre des objets rares dans le jeu) des KM-POINTS (monnaie virtuelle pour obtenir des objets collectors) ainsi que de nombreux autres objets tel que des armures, armes et artefacts).

        


SI LES FONDS NE SONT PAS ATTEINTS?

Le concours sera maintenu bien entendu mais il n'y aura que des lots in-game collector, les fonds récoltés serviront à payer les intervenants du concours, seront partagés à part égale en campagne google pour la promotion du jeu puis en coût de maintien technique du jeu et des serveurs.

Tous les joueurs contributeurs recevront tout de même les rétributions pour lesquels ils ont payés.


LE DEUXIEME EFFET INDIEGOGO!

Vos contributions serviront à plusieurs niveaux pour l'avenir du jeu :

1° La mise en place de ce concours pour vous faire voyager comme indiqué plus haut


2° Si le financement est atteint et que le projet abouti, cela me permettra de promouvoir la fidélité de la communauté de 650km auprès de studios de développement partenaires qui ont besoin d'éléments crédibles pour entreprendre le financement global de la prochaine version du jeu, la V3D!

(Pour voir un aperçu de ce que nous voulons vous offrir comme prochaine version, grâce à Unity3D cliquez sur ce lien Youtube).


Pour être précis, de nombreux studios partenaires de développement sont
interréssés pour développer la version 3D de 650km qui pourra être financée sur INDIEGOGO intégralement, mais pour cela ces studios ont besoin de voir que ce système de financement est fonctionnel et que la communauté est prête à contribuer à son développement tout en gagnant des avantages substanciels pour cette future version.

J'ai déjà testé un principe de financement similaire avec des régies publicitaires qui m'a permis de créer plusieurs add-on du jeu, le livre des anciens, le tir au lapin, les systèmes de déménagement de campement, l'optimisation technique du moteur de jeu, etc.
Ces évolutions ont pu être effectuées en grande partie grâce à vous et je vous en remercie!


La prochaine version du jeu pourra être développée dans le même cadre incluant l'aspect rétribution d'INDIEGOGO, et qui convient parfaitement à mon état d'esprit.

Ce projet de financement est donc faisable grâce à nous tous et il aura un serieux impact sur la viabilité du jeu à long terme.


D'AUTRES FACON D'AIDER

Bien entendu, et toujours en accord avec mon état d'esprit, si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer financièrement pour ce projet, vous pouvez m'aider à en partageant l'existence de ce financement sur vos sites, blogs, pages facebook et tous réseaux sociaux où vous êtes présent.


N'oubliez pas d'utilisez les outils de partage INDIEGOGO, ceux-ci sont simples d'utilisation et leurs impacts seront utiles au projet à coup sûr!
