story:
NEW & UPDATES
September 20th 2013 - IRC Server Online.
    For those of you who are interested in asking questions feel free to contact me on IRC.

    host: irc.universerpg.com
    port: 6667
    channel: #Lobby
WELCOME ABOARD
Hello and welcome to the Indiegogo's home for Star Trek Universe RPG.

Star Trek Universe RPG is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) from Universe RPG Productions. Players can become a starship captain in the various factions, or form an independent alliance within the Star Trek universe all within your browser.

Explore strange new worlds, open up trade routes, become a politician and protect your respective territory alone or with others in the vastness of space.

Decisions in game can lead to various outcomes that can influence the entire universe as a whole. Your actions can range from the destruction of starships to the downfall of entire factions. Every action taken by every player affects the state of the universe, and through those actions affect other players in the game.
ABOUT THE PROJECT
Hello my name is Lenny Raposo and I am the sole developer of Star Trek Universe RPG.

I have been developing this game in my spare time for the past 3 years with the hopes of delivering a game to all fans of everything Trek that can be easily played from a browser without the need of a client package.

My goal is to build a game engine for the space/strategy genre that puts the player in full control of their ship in a realtime 2d environment while playing with or against others. Players will get to fly their ships through the galaxy, trade, hunt, defend, spy, build, conquer and much more.
ABOUT THE DEVELOPER
I am a 35 year old I.T. consultant from Toronto, Canada with over 15 years experience in graphic & web design, programming (PHP, Python, C++, Javascript & HTML), database administration (MySQL, PostgreSQL & MS SQL) and networking (Windows, Unix, Linux & Mac). I am also the proud father of four children and husband to an ever supporting wife.

Being a family man it has been difficult to devote myself fulltime to a project of this magnitude without resorting to turning down work, which is literally an impossibility when you have a family to support,

until now...
WHAT YOU ARE FUNDING
A majority of the funding will be going towards my living expenses as I will be devoting my time fully in developing the game and not tending to or accepting work contracts during this time.

As I have been working on this project for the past 3 years I have been able to procure a number of items for the cause.
  • Uninterruptable Power Supply
    550 Watts/1100 VA
  • Loadbalancers
    2x Pentium Dual Core Systems With 1GB RAM
  • Webservers
    3x Pentium Dual Core Systems With 2GB RAM
  • Database Servers
    2x AMD Quad Cores With 4GB RAM
All systems have been configured with Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Server clustered with failover/loadbalancing to ensure maximum up time. I will also be adding the ability to host Alliance/Clan pages (with subdomains @ universerpg.com) along with open up an IRC server that is dedicated for the game, but there are a few things that I do require in order to have the game run smoother.
  • 1x 8 Core System With
    16GB RAM & 1TB HD ...$600.00
  • 2x 8 Port GBit Switches ...$150.00
  • 2x UPS @ 550 Watts ...$250.00
  • Estimated Total ...$1000.00
WHAT'S NEEDED
I am reaching out to the community in hopes of giving me the opportunity to finish what I started.

A lot of the ground work has been laid down and if I am able to acquire the minimum funding goal of $8,000.00 I can have a minimalistic (see goal marks below for details) game up and running within 4 to 5 months. At this level it will be enjoyable but it will be without a number of bells and whistles.

Of course the ultimate goal would be to reach the full target of $20,000.00 as this will provide the greatest Trek gaming experience (ETA 10 to 12 months).
$8,000.00 MARK
This is the minimum I require to complete my game engine with the basic gameplay elements. It will not be a sophisticated game at this level but it will give fans a taste of what it can be made to do if fully funded.

Below you will find the list of features the game will have, keep in mind that a majority of the ground work has been done and only requires some polishing or very little to be completed.

For those of you that have contributed at the Admiral Level you will get to check out the game development as it happens with your access to the Dev server.
GALACTIC MAP
  • Over 30,000 Star Systems
  • Over 200,000 Planets
  • Near Canon Map (Earth, Vulcan, Romulus, Etc)
  • Spacial Objects (Wormholes, Plasma Storms, Nebulas, Etc)
COMBAT SYSTEM
  • Ship To Ship
  • Ship To Outpost/Trade Port
  • Ship Weapons Management & Maintenance
  • Ship Technology Management & Maintenance
TRADE & COMMERCE
  • Purchasing & Selling Items
  • Reselling Used/Refurbished Items
  • New Goods Development (Trade Tree Of Goods)
  • Relations Based Discounts/Markups
OUTPOSTS
  • Expansion Upgrades (Item Storage, Transwarp Conduits, Etc)
  • Ship, Weapons & Technology Repairs
  • Terraforming Abilities (On Select Planet Classes)
INDEPENDENT ALLIANCES
  • Outpost Creation
  • Taxation Control
  • Ability To Declare War & Trade Agreements (Alliances Only)
GOVERNMENT FACTIONS
  • Starbase, Shipyard & Supply Depot Deployment
  • Starship Upgrading
  • Fleet Deployments & Assignments
  • Taxation Control
  • Faction Relation Influence
  • Ability To Declare War & Trade Agreements (Factions Only)
  • Ability To Annex Star Systems
  • Electoral Voting System
ADDITIONAL ITEMS
  • Totally Redesigned User Interface
  • 50 Playable Starships
  • 10 Different Technologies (Cloak, Point Defense Systems, Etc)
$12,000.00 MARK
OUTPOST ENHANCEMENT
  • Planetary Resource Mining (Gas & Minerals)
  • Orbital Defense Platforms
  • Research Centers
  • Weapon Factories
  • Technology Factories
SKILLS SYSTEM
  • Combat Skills (Improves Targetting)
  • Engineering Skills (Improves Ship Hull Repairs)
  • Navigation Skills (Improves Defense)
  • Science Skills (Improves Sensors)
  • Diplomacy Skills (Improves Trade Negotiations)
ADDITIONAL ITEMS
  • Open Stockmarket System
  • Bounty Hunting System
  • Debris Scavenging & Ship Looting
  • Additional 5 Playable Starships (55)
STARSHIP ENHANCEMENT
  • Upgrade Components (Shields, Warp Core, Impulse Engines, Etc)
  • Hardpoint Management
  • Power Distribution Control
$16,000.00 MARK
CORPORATIONS SYSTEM
  • Pricing Control Over Resources On Controlled Planets
  • Can Be Subcontracted By Government Factions For Arms Manufacturing
  • Can Buy Out Other Alliance Controlled Resources
  • Listing In The Stockmarket
ADVANCED POLITICS
  • Attacking A Faction Leader/Official Can Instigate War
  • When A Faction Loses A War It Will Lose 1% Of It's Territory
  • Faction Members Can Overthrow Their Leaders Via Impeachment Vote Or Starting A Civil War
  • Technology Sharing With Other Factions
ADDITIONAL ITEMS
  • Realtime Communications
  • Detailed Ship Lights & Glows
  • Additional 5 Playable Starships (60)
JOBS & MISSIONS
  • Military Missions
  • Space Exploration
  • Trade Route Protection
  • Arms Delivery
$20,000.00 MARK
ENHANCED ANIMATIONS
  • Warp & Impulse Drive Trails
  • Damage Textures For Ships
  • Plasma Smoke From Damaged Ships
  • Planetary & Spacial Object Movement
  • Various Explosion Clouds
FACTION CREATION
  • Turns Alliances Into A Full Fledged Government Faction Once Certain Criteria Is Met
  • All Perks Of Government Factions & Rules Apply With The Exception Of Voting As These Factions Are Of A Dictorial Type
  • What Differentiates This Faction Type From The Main 5 (Klingons, Romulans, Etc) Is That They Can Be Completely Obliterated
ADDITIONAL ITEMS
  • Non Playable Characters (AI)
  • Firing Arc System For Ships
  • Additional 10 Playable Starships (70)

Expansion Upgrades (Item Storage, Transwarp Conduits, Etc)
Ship, Weapons & Technology Repairs
Terraforming Abilities (On Select Planet Classes)




INDEPENDENT ALLIANCES


Outpost Creation
Taxation Control
Ability To Declare War & Trade Agreements (Alliances Only)




GOVERNMENT FACTIONS


Starbase, Shipyard & Supply Depot Deployment
Starship Upgrading
Fleet Deployments & Assignments
Taxation Control
Faction Relation Influence
Ability To Declare War & Trade Agreements (Factions Only)
Ability To Annex Star Systems
Electoral Voting System




ADDITIONAL ITEMS


Totally Redesigned User Interface
50 Playable Starships
10 Different Technologies (Cloak, Point Defense Systems, Etc)







$12,000.00 MARK







OUTPOST ENHANCEMENT


Planetary Resource Mining (Gas & Minerals)
Orbital Defense Platforms
Research Centers
Weapon Factories
Technology Factories




SKILLS SYSTEM


Combat Skills (Improves Targetting)
Engineering Skills (Improves Ship Hull Repairs)
Navigation Skills (Improves Defense)
Science Skills (Improves Sensors)
Diplomacy Skills (Improves Trade Negotiations)




ADDITIONAL ITEMS


Open Stockmarket System
Bounty Hunting System
Debris Scavenging & Ship Looting
Additional 5 Playable Starships (55)




STARSHIP ENHANCEMENT


Upgrade Components (Shields, Warp Core, Impulse Engines, Etc)
Hardpoint Management
Power Distribution Control







$16,000.00 MARK







CORPORATIONS SYSTEM


Pricing Control Over Resources On Controlled Planets
Can Be Subcontracted By Government Factions For Arms Manufacturing
Can Buy Out Other Alliance Controlled Resources
Listing In The Stockmarket




ADVANCED POLITICS


Attacking A Faction Leader/Official Can Instigate War
When A Faction Loses A War It Will Lose 1% Of It's Territory
Faction Members Can Overthrow Their Leaders Via Impeachment Vote Or Starting A Civil War
Technology Sharing With Other Factions




ADDITIONAL ITEMS


Realtime Communications
Detailed Ship Lights & Glows
Additional 5 Playable Starships (60)




JOBS & MISSIONS


Military Missions
Space Exploration
Trade Route Protection
Arms Delivery







$20,000.00 MARK







ENHANCED ANIMATIONS


Warp & Impulse Drive Trails
Damage Textures For Ships
Plasma Smoke From Damaged Ships
Planetary & Spacial Object Movement
Various Explosion Clouds




FACTION CREATION


Turns Alliances Into A Full Fledged Government Faction Once Certain Criteria Is Met
All Perks Of Government Factions & Rules Apply With The Exception Of Voting As These Factions Are Of A Dictorial Type
What Differentiates This Faction Type From The Main 5 (Klingons, Romulans, Etc) Is That They Can Be Completely Obliterated




ADDITIONAL ITEMS


Non Playable Characters (AI)
Firing Arc System For Ships
Additional 10 Playable Starships (70)

story:
UPDATE (6/28): We will STILL finish the board game regardless of whether we hit the goal or not. We managed to raise enough for the artwork, and we'll just manufacture much less copies than before! Price will still remain the same (for backers) Thank you for your support! ^__^

                  


Overview

White Ravens is very happy to present Sweet Sabotage! This is an upcoming board game designed by Filipino Game Designer, Charles Cue! Sweet Sabotage is a crazy two to six player board game where you play as a maid or a butler and you create desserts to serve to customers and gain the master’s favor for the cafe ownership. Is one of your rivals getting the upper hand? Are you missing that one key ingredient for your dessert? SABOTAGE your rivals! There can only be one inheritor for the cafe, make sure it’s YOU!

             

We have brought the prototype version of the game to many different board game nights and events, both in Vancouver and the Philippines. The game has received much positive feedback from the players, and there has been a lot of support in bringing this board game to life.


Prototype and Gameplay

Here’s the gameplay video we made for our board game. Take note, all images in our game components in the video are from our prototype version and are not ours. Don’t worry, our replacement art assets will be made by talented professional artists!



Testimonials and Marketing

Here’s a testimonial video for the board game from Lisa Smedman, a well-known novelist and game designer. She had done design work for Advanced Dungeons and Dragons since the late 1980s. Watch what she has to say about the game here:


We have also spent the last few months promoting the game, throughout different game meetups (Trumpeters, Full Indie), as well as different board game and anime conventions. We have promoted the game in Vancouver (Trumpeters Salute, Terminal City Tabletop Convention), and in the Philippines (Tagcom: Toys and Hobbies Convention, Ozine Anime Convention). Sweet Sabotage has received very positive feedback from the players who have tried the game, and are excited in seeing the board game hit the store shelves soon! With that, we're very motivated and we would like to achieve this dream with you! ^__^

We have also been featured by a few bloggers and game groups:

"Wonderful game, simple to learn, nothing like it!" - Trumpeters Tabletop Society
"I almost won. I just was too nice to sabotage my neighbors." - SkySenshi.com
"Not too simple and not too complex. You’ll understand the game soon enough to have more time enjoying the competition for your master’s favor."  - Ironfiftynine
"A wonderful game, where have that opportunity to screw other people!" Gamemasons

Here are some screenshots of us promoting the board game in some Philippine conventions!

       

                            

We're very thankful to our friends and family who have helped support us in this campaign! ^__^

Our Current Progress

Here are some of the cards and components we're working on towards the game so far! These are just a few cards completed for the actual final product, and we'll need your help to finish the art of all of components for Sweet Sabotage! ^_^ Note that all card stats and card layouts are subject to change!


Funding

We have already talked with our manufacturer, and it will cost several thousand dollars to mass manufacture the game. On top of that, we need some money to pay our freelance artists who will provide original art for the game. We have enough to shoulder the freelance artists and marketing costs, so this will leave us with just for that expensive part of manufacturing.

We are using Panda Game Manufacturing to manufacture our board game, and it's $9,000 we need to raise for Sweet Sabotage!

(UPDATE: Panda Game Manufacturing  requires a minimum of 1500 copies of the board game to be manufactured. In case we don't meet our goal, we will look for other manufacturers to produce less copies. Don't worry, the  quality will  remain the same :) )

Shipping Costs

One of the biggest costs is shipping. As much as we want to keep the cost of the board game low, shipping is something we avoid bloating up.

The good news is,  we have found an amazing way to ship Sweet Sabotage in the most cost-effective way possible! (read more about it here) In fact, allows us to send you to receive multiple copies of the board game, and only pay the cost of shipping ONE board game! 

This means you can collaborate with a friend to go for a higher perk, or if you own a board game shop and are looking to stock up on the board game, you can go for that DESSERTS OVERLOAD perk ($199) , and not only get 10 board games for the price of less than 6, but also you pay shipping cost for ONE board game, AND have your shop/group be recognized as Silver Contributors at our credits section of the instructions sheet! It’s a win-win situation! =). This method is especially recommended to everyone from the European Union to help reduce those customs tax!

But wait... there's MORE!

Since we are manufacturing and shipping from China, we can afford to provide up to $14 shipping credit to all backers of the campaign! This means, not only do you get much cheaper shipping costs from around the world, but most East Asian and SE Asian countries will have the benefit of NOT having to pay shipping at all! WOW, amazing deal! ^__^

For a full list of shipping costs, here’s a visual table on how much you’ll need to add on top of your perk for the number of board games:

In case you don't know your country code, you can search for it here.


Stretch Goals

If we raise enough money during the campaign, here are some possible extensions we can do for our game!

  • $12,000 - We're going to create a Staff-version of each Player Menu. See each staff member's personality shine on each of their respective menus!
  • $17,000 - We will turn the instruction booklet into comic book/manga-style! Enjoy reading through the instructions in FULL visual form! Don't worry, we will still make the instructions easy to learn. For a better
  • $22,000 - We'll write up a one-shot digital manga of Sweet Sabotage for all backers to enjoy reading, while waiting for their shipments to arrive on February!
  • $27,000 - ??? (Unlock the $22,000 stretch goal to reveal!)

What you Get

Here are what's included when you get a copy of the board game:

  • 108 Cards to unfold the experience (32 Desserts, 32 Customers, 32 Sabotage, 6 Staff, and 6 Action Points Guide)
  • 160 Ingredient Chips to build those tasty desserts!
  • 36 Time Chips to help determine who's about to stomp out of the cafe!
  • 6 Fold-able Player Menu to enhance your cafe-serving experience!
  • 1 Fold-able Mat for the Customer Queue and Ingredients Queue to have order!
  • 1 Instruction Booklet to make sure nobody sabotages beyond the rules!
  • Expected MSRP: $40 (plus shipping)

About Us

Charles Cue

Lead Game Designer and Project Head (White Ravens)

Charles has been actively designing and developing video games for the past 4 years. He graduated with a Computer Science Degree at De La Salle University-Manila, Philippines in 2011. He won several game design awards in the Philippines, the most recent one being the Best Local Indie Game of 2013 in the Philippines Game Development Festival 2013.

Today, Charles is finishing up his Diploma in Game Design at the Art Institute of Vancouver, and he’s set to graduate in September 2014. He loves designing games, and pours his heart out on his craft.


Ellie Licuanan

Lead Game Artist (White Ravens)

Ellie loves art and drawing has been her passion and hobby ever since she was a little girl. She finished Multimedia Arts at De La Salle - College of Saint Benilde. Her specialty is 2D Art with an emphasis on Japanese Anime/Manga style. She has been training to learn UI design, digital painting, vector art, layout, etc. Ellie has been working with the gaming industry in the Philippines for the past 3 years and is enjoying it.

Aside from art and games, Ellie likes singing and music. She loves to relax whenever there is free time and when completely charged up, she pours out everything, heart and soul into her craft.

You can check her works in Deviantart and tumblr:
http://angelstale.deviantart.com
http://crowravens.tumblr.com


Lou Pineda

Freelance Artist

Lou is a Multi-media Arts graduate from the Philippines. She is currently working as a lead artist for a gaming company and she also does freelance work for a living. She likes to enjoy the afternoon sketching or playing with her pet dog Miswa.

You can check out more of Lou's works in this site:
https://www.behance.net/loupineda

Olivia Chung

Game Designer

Olivia is a blogger, streamer and video game designer from Vancouver, BC. She is currently studying at the Art Institute of Vancouver and is set to complete her studies in September 2014.

In the past, Olivia studied psychology, Japanese, English, creative writing, and financial accounting. She has an appreciation for art, music, fashion, and Japanese culture. In her spare time, Olivia enjoys cooking, karaoke, drawing, cosplay, and playing video games.


Spread the Word!

We really hope you will help support us in bringing the board game to life. We are really passionate working on this board game, and it is our dream to bring this to your hands! Please support us by selecting one of our perks at the top. If not, please spread the word, and share this page with your friends! ^_^ Every new supporter counts!


Should you have any questions, please drop us an email at: charles@whiteravens.net

                   


Thank you so much masters! Let us work together and make this dream a reality!

Finally, we'd like to extend a huge thank you to Karl Benavidez (kentamidorin) for the amazing and cute opening video for Sweet Sabotage! ^__^

story:
We've been working on this project for some time and we want to share it with the world.

PONPU came up from our love for Bomberman-like videogame titles and our wish to make a fun tournament based fighting game. We want to make PONPU the best game it can be, and with your help, our dream might finally come true.

You can now play an HTML5 demo version of the game, no need to download anything!

 

               

 

Ponpu’s gameplay style is heavily inspired by the original Bomberman games. You’ll be throwing explosive eggs, break the battleground to get to your enemies and blow them up with your mighty and feathery power to collect battle points in the shape of fancy coins. The winner will be only bird standing or the one that’s got the most coins before the time is up.                                     

                                  

         

           

 

                 

Sure, you can challenge your friends to very spectacular duels, but Ponpu’s main attraction are the tournaments, where you will battle against other people for true glory. Winning them will grant you new powers and all sorts of rewards for you to show off.

 

                             

 

                           

Ponpu can generate and throw a variety of rare, explosive eggs that can be used as a deadly weapon, aside from a bunch of other equally bizarre set of abilities.

                                                             

 

                             

 

We're a small indie studio and our resources are limited, but we got a lot of ideas we want to implement in the game to make it way more fun and complete. That's the main reason we're making a funding campaign. We hope we can achieve these things with a little help from people around the world, so we can all enjoy the final result!

                            

 

We want to be clear from the very start, and let people know what's happening and how it's happening in every stage of the process. Make them participate as an active part of the project and make sure they know what we do with the funding and where everything goes to.

                   

                             

By becoming supporters of this project, people will be getting a set of rewards based on the tier they pledge to. We appreciate immensely all help we can get to make this come true, so we want to make sure we reward everyone for their help!

 

                 

 

                             

We have a small, passionate team of 9 people, but each one of us geeky ducklings are willing to unleash our secret powers to take over the world, beware!

story:
Hi! We're two people who share a passion for all things bicycle.

We've been living in Bicycle City, USA, for 25 collective years (Shawn 10 and April 15).  In that time we've soaked up a lot of what makes Portland a unique place.  We've also logged in thousands of miles of traveling by bike around the Northwest.  Now we want to go to the next level.


We want to explore both the United States and Canada by the saddles of our bicycles.  An adventure like this is ambitious enough in its own right.  But we don't want to just ride thousands of miles, see some sights, and take some photos.  We want to see what's going on in other cities and towns in regards to bicycling.  A lot has happened over the last decade or so. Scenes have popped up in towns small and large.  Bike lanes are being striped.  The number of cyclists is going up and up. 


There are a lot of factors going into this Bicycle Renaissance but we want to concentrate on the human factor--the people who are making a difference in their own way. We want to see what kinds of cool stuff other cities are doing, like fun rides or other events. We want to seek out and talk to those people.  The blogger. The zine writer. The person who started up a weekly or monthly ride.  The folks who run the community bicycle shop. The advocates and activists.  The bicycle artists and crafters.  And the people who just love bicycles. 


We're taking the road on May 25 and don't plan to be home until November.  In the five months we'll be riding, we'll slowly head eastward from Portland with the ultimate goal of Halifax, Nova Scotia.  Along the way we'll hit up national parks like North Cascades, Glacier, Waterton Lakes, Banff, and Jasper, and cities as diverse as Seattle, Vancouver, Spokane, Missoula, Calgary, Edmonton, Saskatoon, Regina, Winnipeg, Fargo, Duluth, Minneapolis, Iowa City, Chicago, Fort Wayne, Columbus, Pittsburgh, Washington DC, Baltimore, Philadelphia, New York, New Haven, Boston, Burlington, Montreal, and Quebec City.


We'll be writing about our adventures through our respective blogs, http://urbanadventureleague.blogspot.com/ (Shawn) and http://aprillikesbikes.wordpress.com/ (April).  


But ultimately we want to collect our adventures into a book!  A book, you say?  Rest assured, we're not novices to publishing.  Shawn has been involved in mini-comics and zines for 15 years, self publishing the comic Ten Foot Rule and editing the Zinester's Guide To Portland, published by Microcosm Publishing.

The Impact

A lot has been made about the Bicycle Renaissance, but much of it has focused on "numbers"--amount of people bicycle commuting, number and length of bike lanes, etc.  We want to bring attention to the less tangible aspects.  We also want to shine a light on the people making it happen in less conspicuous ways.  One does not have to be a policy wonk to make a difference.


By sharing our experiences through the web and a book we hope to inspire others to "do something".  We want to show folks that they aren't alone out there.  We want to show folks that bicycle touring is a fun thing to do, and while our tour is definitely on the "ambitious" side, anyone can do a tour if they have the right mindset. We also want to show people that they can start bike fun in their own towns.

 What We Need & What You Get

We're frugal folks and have experience living on little.  We're going to do this trip no matter what, but any and all donations will help us on the road.  We're looking at being on the road for up to five months so money is definitely important.  The money we'll get will be used towards the expenses on the road--food, lodging, transit beyond bicycles when needed, and bicycle repairs and maintenance.  What we have left over if any will help us with the publishing aspect of this project.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Host us along our route!  We'll be staying at a mix of campgrounds, hostels, friend's homes, and Warmshowers hosts along the way, but we can always use a hand here.  Lodging is the biggest expense of a tour besides food.  Giving us a spot to sleep for a night or two will help alleviate this, plus we love staying with interesting folks whenever we can. You can check out the rough route of the tour on my blog here to see where we're going.
  • Give us info!  We want to check out as many cool things as possible along the way, whether it be natural splendour, cool bike shops, interesting bicycle events, people doing good things involving bicycles, you know what we mean. I've been doing as much research as possible, but can always use more advice.
  • Ride with us!  If you feel like spending a day or two or even more bicycle touring with us, please let us know.
  • Spread the word!
story_txt:
Hi! We're two people who share a passion for all things bicycle.
We've been living in Bicycle City, USA, for 25 collective years (Shawn 10 and April 15).  In that time we've soaked up a lot of what makes Portland a unique place.  We've also logged in thousands of miles of traveling by bike around the Northwest.  Now we want to go to the next level.

We want to explore both the United States and Canada by the saddles of our bicycles.  An adventure like this is ambitious enough in its own right.  But we don't want to just ride thousands of miles, see some sights, and take some photos.  We want to see what's going on in other cities and towns in regards to bicycling.  A lot has happened over the last decade or so. Scenes have popped up in towns small and large.  Bike lanes are being striped.  The number of cyclists is going up and up. 

There are a lot of factors going into this Bicycle Renaissance but we want to concentrate on the human factor--the people who are making a difference in their own way. We want to see what kinds of cool stuff other cities are doing, like fun rides or other events. We want to seek out and talk to those people.  The blogger. The zine writer. The person who started up a weekly or monthly ride.  The folks who run the community bicycle shop. The advocates and activists.  The bicycle artists and crafters.  And the people who just love bicycles. 

We're taking the road on May 25 and don't plan to be home until November.  In the five months we'll be riding, we'll slowly head eastward from Portland with the ultimate goal of Halifax, Nova Scotia.  Along the way we'll hit up national parks like North Cascades, Glacier, Waterton Lakes, Banff, and Jasper, and cities as diverse as Seattle, Vancouver, Spokane, Missoula, Calgary, Edmonton, Saskatoon, Regina, Winnipeg, Fargo, Duluth, Minneapolis, Iowa City, Chicago, Fort Wayne, Columbus, Pittsburgh, Washington DC, Baltimore, Philadelphia, New York, New Haven, Boston, Burlington, Montreal, and Quebec City.

We'll be writing about our adventures through our respective blogs, http://urbanadventureleague.blogspot.com/ (Shawn) and http://aprillikesbikes.wordpress.com/ (April).  

But ultimately we want to collect our adventures into a book!  A book, you say?  Rest assured, we're not novices to publishing.  Shawn has been involved in mini-comics and zines for 15 years, self publishing the comic Ten Foot Rule and editing the Zinester's Guide To Portland, published by Microcosm Publishing.

The Impact
A lot has been made about the Bicycle Renaissance, but much of it has focused on "numbers"--amount of people bicycle commuting, number and length of bike lanes, etc.  We want to bring attention to the less tangible aspects.  We also want to shine a light on the people making it happen in less conspicuous ways.  One does not have to be a policy wonk to make a difference.

By sharing our experiences through the web and a book we hope to inspire others to "do something".  We want to show folks that they aren't alone out there.  We want to show folks that bicycle touring is a fun thing to do, and while our tour is definitely on the "ambitious" side, anyone can do a tour if they have the right mindset. We also want to show people that they can start bike fun in their own towns.

 What We Need & What You Get
We're frugal folks and have experience living on little.  We're going to do this trip no matter what, but any and all donations will help us on the road.  We're looking at being on the road for up to five months so money is definitely important.  The money we'll get will be used towards the expenses on the road--food, lodging, transit beyond bicycles when needed, and bicycle repairs and maintenance.  What we have left over if any will help us with the publishing aspect of this project.


Other Ways You Can Help



Host us along our route!  We'll be staying at a mix of campgrounds, hostels, friend's homes, and Warmshowers hosts along the way, but we can always use a hand here.  Lodging is the biggest expense of a tour besides food.  Giving us a spot to sleep for a night or two will help alleviate this, plus we love staying with interesting folks whenever we can. You can check out the rough route of the tour on my blog here to see where we're going.

Give us info!  We want to check out as many cool things as possible along the way, whether it be natural splendour, cool bike shops, interesting bicycle events, people doing good things involving bicycles, you know what we mean. I've been doing as much research as possible, but can always use more advice.

Ride with us!  If you feel like spending a day or two or even more bicycle touring with us, please let us know.
Spread the word!

story:
We are THE KOOR COLLECTION! 

We specialise in handmade recycled furniture. We custom build and also sell KOOR originals. 

The KOOR team is made up of long time friends Kiz and Nat. This year we turned our passion for interiors and quality made furniture from hobby to the real deal and launched our business. 

This September we have the privilege of living out our other passion and will head to Alto, Peru on a volunteer building aid mission trip with MISFIT AID AUSTRALIA.

What We Need & What You Get

Your contributions will go directly to purchasing the locally sourced building materials we will be using on the various projects planned for the trip including new roofs for 10 families in the area. In return, we have the following PERKS.

  • A donation of $20 or more puts you in the draw to win a KOOR custom piece of furniture of your own
  • 1st prize to the value of $500
  • 2nd prize to the value $200
  • To increase your chances to win simply donate more coin!
  • $40 will see your name in the draw 2 times, $50 3 times and donations of $100 or more 10 times!!
  • This perk is for Sydney residents only due logistical reasons (shipping etc) but don't let this stop you from donating anyway!
  • Winners will be drawn and notified at the conclusion of our campaign
  • We will then meet with you to design and create your dream custom piece of furniture.

The Impact

This is the second trip to the community headed by Misfit Aid trip the first being in September 2013. Nat was privileged enough to go on this trip and has been itching to get back ever since.

  • The primary objective of this trip, is to re-construct/repair the roofing of 10 households throughout the community, currently deemed uninhabitable.
  • LAN Airways have sponsored our flights, so donors can be assured that all funds contributed will go directly to the purchased of building materials

Other Ways You Can Help

If you guys would like to help get the word out about this campaign, or would know others who may be interested in contributing, please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get the word out. 

Also, if you would like to learn more about the work of Misfit Aid Australia, be sure to check out Misfit Aid.

story:
THE GAME

Spank Master is the first Spanking Card Game in the world. We created this game because we truly love women (and men as well) and especially their exquisite butts! The game is all about spanking some pretty asses, using various spanking tools and mastering the use of both special and bad asses cards. Combine all these elements and become a Spank Master yourself!


The deck contains exactly 69 cards and that’s not a coincidence! Each deck is divided into 5 different categories:                                                                      

                               


the more of them you spank, the better chance you will have of becoming a Spank Master. So grab some and spank your way to victory!

                                                                               

                                       


unique not only in their shape, but also due to the bonus you get for spanking each of them

                                                                                 

avoid spanking them at all costs. You may not only lose the chance of becoming a Spank Master, but something else as well

                                                                         

basic accessories for anyone who wants to achieve spanking perfection. These tools are for you to test them on all these glorious butts!

                                               

if you haven't had a chance to use any of them yet, now is your chance, these little bad boys add a whole new layer to the game!


                       

                                              Check out the goals we would like to spank.




We are a group of illustrators, graphic artists, graphic designers, gamers, dreamers and…hornballs. We believe spanking can be a real art in which both the spanker and the spanked can thoroughly enjoy. Our game gives everyone a chance to become a Spank Master and achieve the perfection of spanking all while spending a good time with fellow ass lovers. Check out how we’ve been working on modeling our asses. Or rather– asses from our cards.


A Spank Master is something more than the average card game. We are sure it can help make the world a more beautiful place. Everyone likes to spank, but not everyone knows how to do it. Open your mind to the future of asses and help us fulfill the dream of spanking them all. We like to call it “The Spank Dream”. Become a part “The Spank Dream” yourself!

                                                         

                                                          With love for asses,

                                                     The Spank Master Team


For more information about the game: http://www.spankmastergame.com

Follow us: http://www.facebook.com/spankmastergame

F**K FAQ

Is this game only for men?

Of course not! It’s absolutely for everyone! It’s about having fun so everyone will find a way to pleasure themselves.

What's the age range?

Although we do not show any “X rated” material in Spank Master, it’s dedicated to people 18 years and older. There is no upper limit. Quite the contrary – thanks to Spank Master you can live your second youth!

How many players can play?

To spank around a bit at least 2 players are needed and up to 4 players can play simultaneously. But remember, the more players the less spanking. And who wants less spanking?

How long does it take to learn and play?

Supposedly everyone is born with the skill of spanking, so just a few minutes should be enough to learn the necessary rules. Gameplay lasts a few minutes, depending on how many decks of cards and how skilled the players are at the art of spanking.

What's included?

The basic deck contains 69 game cards with the sweetest, baddest, most glorious,  asses you’ve ever seen. Packaged in a box that everyone will love for its easy instructions and unique style.

In addition, a huge amount of fun fits in each box.

Do you offer international shipping?

Yes! We can’t let any part of the world miss out on Spank Master!

story:
7th Annual NES Marathon Benefiting Children's Miracle Network Hospitals - CURRENTLY LIVE AT https://www.twitch.tv/nesmarathon

Pat and Ian are back for the 7th classic Nintendo gaming marathon as they raise money for the Children's Miracle Network! Watch them LIVE during the event as they play from a library of over 800 8-bit Nintendo games, interact with viewers, and give away prizes. There's also special guest cameos of other internet personalities who "stop by" via video! This year there will be events (exclusive videos, game challenges, etc.) that will be unlocked via donation amount goals reached! This page will be updated with those events as well as the giveaways as they are announced!

The live event begins Saturday, Nov. 12th at 3PM EST / 12PM PST! Tune in and watch the fun at NESmarathon.com!

Donating & Shaping the NES Marathon

All proceeds will go to the Children's Miracle Network, an organization that provides money to children's hospitals in need: 

Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals® raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than $5 billion, most of it $1 at a time through the charity’s Miracle Balloon icon. Its various fundraising partners and programs support the nonprofit’s mission to save and improve the lives of as many children as possible. Find out why children’s hospitals need community support, identify your member hospital and learn how you can Put Your Money Where the Miracles Are, at CMNHospitals.org and facebook.com/CMNHospitals.

Any donation amount is greatly appreciated! If you donate at the $40 and above level, you will be able to help choose what games Pat and Ian play! Donors who select those perks have the option of making the donation in the name of any NES title released on the system, via Indiegogo's comment system. The more money raised in the name of any individual game, the more time will be allotted for Pat and Ian to play it! The NES marathon really relies on the input of the viewers -- so help out a great cause and help make the event what you want to watch! Another bonus in donating: since it is a charitable organization you are donating to, your contribution will be 100% tax deductible!

Note: All game-playing and time lengths are up to the discretion of Ian/Pat. Game-play lengths may not be exact and may be cut for time due to amount of games scheduled.

So that's what's going on! During the event, we'll have fun, prizes, and some surprises in store. This page will be updated in the near future with more perks and specific stretch goals that you can look forward to. 

Sponsorship Opportunities

Another way in which the NES Marathon is able to raise money is by offering visibility and advertising to websites, organizations, businesses, and individuals who wish to make a larger donation and help sponsor the event. In return for these generous donations the donor will receive exposure in the form of banners on the marathon's main page, radio style read-out ads, commercial spots during regular break times, and at the highest levels call-ins and dedicated hour blocks. Tens of thousands of viewers watched the 6th Annual event last year, and it was featured on Twitch! Here's your chance for your website/business to gain some great exposure while helping out a great cause with a 100% tax-deductible donation! Please check out the available package perks at the side for more details! If donating, all marketing pictures/materials must be submitted by November 15.

Spreading the Word

The NES Marathon's success is based largely upon others spreading the word via Twitter, Facebook, etc. Indiegogo.com can actually track how many donation referrals come in through your retweeting, posting the link, etc. To show our appreciation, we will reward the person responsible with the most donation referrals with a prize! We'll announce what this is later.

You can spread the word on social media using hashtag #NESMarathon - hopefully we can get it trending the weekend of Nov. 12! Let any friends and family know about the event, and even try and tell celebrities you may follow. In the past, they've helped spread the word!

Thank You!

The NES Marathon has raised over $90,000 for hospitalized children in its first five years and we hope to continue strongly this year and into the future. Thanks to everyone for taking the time to read this page and all past/present donors and sponsors. Please help spread the word spread the word about this event on social media, twitter, etc. to help get the event more exposure and donations! We can't wait for Nov. 12th!      

 

Marathon Milestones & Goals!
(subject to change)

Donation Milestone    Event Unlocked

$500  Super Mario Bros

$1,000  Wally Bear and the No! Gang

$1,500  Castlevania

$2,000  Arkanoid

$2,500  Rampart

$3,000  Baby Boomer

$3,500  Spy Hunter

$4,000  Bubble Bobble

$4,500  Dusty Diamond All Star Softball

$5,000  Gun Nac

$5,500  Double Dragon II

$6,000  Contra

$6,500  Kung Fu speed run

$7,000  Werewolf

$7,500  Excitebike VS

$8,000  Linkara

$8,500  Three Stooges

$9,000  Guerilla War 2 player co-op

$9,500  Jirard Chooses a Game

$10,000  Brentalfloss

$10,500  Tecmo Superbowl

$11,000  Andre Meadows

$11,500  Rock N Ball

$12,000  Pixel Dan

$12,500  Super Dodge Ball

$13,000  Gaming Historian

$13,500  Frank Stops By

$14,000  Kevin Lieber

$14,500  Ice Hockey Challenge

$15,000  AVGN Exclusive Video

$15,500  Pro Wrestling

$16,000  8-Bit Alli

$16,500  Mr. Gimmick

$17,000  Silk Worm

$17,500  Pat Chooses a Game

$18,000  Top Gun

$18,500  Danny Sullivan's Indy Heat

$19,000  Abobo Deathmatch

$19,500  Action 52

$20,000  Legend of Zelda

story:
Pictures and video footage are featuring current prototype version of the game and do not represent the final quality.

Save the picture or open it in a new tab to view the full size.


The Game

In this game you can build your spaceship block by block, solo or with your friends, and survive in a rogue like style in a randomly generated universe. Progress from the tiny ship with one weapon to a big carier with alot of powerfull weapons, drones and systems. Find upgrades, new blocks, ship systems, and places to explore.

  • Design your spaceship

It matters what systems you build and where you place them. Build anti rocket defences, drone bays, torpedo launchers, cloacking devices, scaners, shields, generators, turrets, cannons, and more. 

  • Fight smart

Use your weapons and systems wisely in real time tactical battles. All types of weapons will have their destinct purpose.

  • Cooperate

You can play with your friends on one or multiple ships, or even build a carrier with a smaller ships inside to use them for situations where you need an extra maneuverability or stealthiness.

  • Be the crew of your ship

Players are mooving around inside the ship and interacting with it through control panels on the walls and consoles for all the ship systems. You can set targets for your weapons or fire them manualy, individually or by groups. Set a throttle of your engines to set a trajectory or engage autopilot, while you are interacting with other modules or fixing your ship.

  • Be inside the game with Oculus Rift

I'm building the game with Oculus Rift (virtual reality headset) support in mind. I'll implement it as soon as I get my hands on the devkit  or the consumer version of the Oculus, and when I get the Unity Pro license.

Save the picture or open it in a new tab to view the full size.


Current Progress

The basic prototyping is done. The criticall systems are tested, such as ship generation, building, local gravity, collisions, physics, multiplayer, general perfomance and gameplay. Everything works, and biggest challenges are behind. 

I took a good rest after presentation was done and before my credit card has been issued and I could launch the camaign. Now I will step back and build a robust class structure before adding new features into the game. I'll keep you posted on the progress.

The trailer and screenshots are featuring testing of the prototype version of the game. Pretty much everything will look and work better in later versions. For example ships will have shields and weapons will not destroy blocks so easily. There will be much more different kinds of blocks and decorative pannels. The lighting system will be different. The players, weapons and doors will have propper voxel models. Shadows will work. Modules like generators and engines are represented by simple blocks only in prototype. And so on, and so on. 

Save the picture or open it in a new tab to view the full size.


11.000$

I am developing this game on my own and I'll finish it no matter what, but with your support I'll be able to dedicate all my time and effort to this project and release it as soon as possible. The more funding I get, the better tools and working environment I'll be able to afford. That's why I chose flexible funding option. And please bear in mind that when you are funding this campaign via PayPal I'm getting the money immidiately wich is helpfull when I need the money while campaign is running. 

The 11.000$ includes following: 

  • Money for living with additional funding in the future - 3000$

Even if I get just 3000$, the campaign will be a minor succes for me. In about six month this game should reach some early playable state or at least look more like it suppose to, and I will be able to get an additional funding if needed. 3000$ for 6 month is 25% below average wage in my region, It is absolutely enough, at the moment.

  • uLink license - 735$

uLink is a networking plugin for unity. Scripting a coop game with it is almost as easy as scripting a single player game.

  • Basic sound assets and extra tools - 265$

It's space and all vacuum, but hey, who wants a game with no sounds? :) That's just a sounds from sound asset libraries, usually around 2$ each. I will use them if they fit well or temporarily untill I'll be able to hire a sound designer. This money are also can be used to purchase a small plugins that cost usualy from 25$ to 75$.

  • Unity Pro - 1500$ or 75$/month

Unity Pro license is required for the Oculus Rift support. It allows using the post processing effects like glow and motion blur, a soft shadows and more. Unity Pro also has a Profiler - a powerfull tool for optimisation and debugging.

  • Oculus Rift - 300$ + shipping

An Oculus devkit. When I will get it, I will implement Rift support, immediately.

  • Hire a sound designer 1000$+

Game needs unique and high quality sound effects. 

  • Hire a composer 1000$+

Music for the game. I didn't contact any composer yet so I'm not sure about the pricing.

  • Extra money for living and other expenses 3000$+

To focus on the development instead of showcasing and getting funding I need enough money to be able to develop the game untill at least a beta version. How many time it will take I can't tell, but most likely a year at least. Creating a demo version at the early stages slows down developement significantly and preparing the presentation takes alot of time too. Also this category may include hiring a web designer to build a game website, buying a propper office chair instead of my wooden chair :), Laptop for working when I'm not at home, etc.

  • Indiegogo fee 4 - 9%

If the campaign will be fully funded, a 4% fee will be taken, or a 9% fee if it won't.

Save the picture or open it in a new tab to view the full size.


Promotion

Thank you so much if you decided to fund this project! You also can help by promoting it. Please use share tools at the top of the page under the video, tell people about this game. Any promotion can make a big difference.

Save the picture or open it in a new tab to view the full size.


Thank you!

Thank you! Love you, sincerely.

story:
Gamentio, a product of Logic Simplified, aspires to disrupt the Social Casino (Non-Gambling) scene by introducing the concept of online 3D, so as to bring the online gaming experience closer to a real experience. This is achieved by enabling players to choose customizable 3D Avatars equipped with command-based gestures & expressions (joy, frustration, applause etc), in a 3D setting that looks & feels as if one is playing in a land-based casino.


Please note that Gamentio is purely entertainment-oriented where players can play using virtual money. Gamentio doesn't support or encourage gambling.

Please go ahead and try our games at gamentio.com - choose your Avatar and play your favorite card game (Currently only on Desktop).

Our Work

We have transformed social card games from non-vibrant 2D environments to most scintillating, emotion-packed 3D card games, where each player expresses his emotions through his avatar. Our evolution is similar to Counter Strike from Contra in card games.

Our Dream is big & Crowdfunding is the best place where we get opinions and funds. You can try our Avatars and animations in our card games online (no downloads required). Please try our games & send us your opinion - It will make a world of difference (pun intended!)

We have designed around 20 Avatars and  launched three 3D Card Games - Poker, Rummy & Teen Patti (also known as Flush or Flash)- Social card games you can play with your family. In the first year, we will do only card games and the build more social games.

With your financial support, we expect to be one of the world’s best 3D multiplayer social gaming company.


Who We Are

We are a team of Game Developers & Artists from a small town Dehradun in India.


What we have done so far

We have achieved most of it at the development front! Try gamentio.com to check our alpha web version and please share your valuable suggestions.

Note: It’s still in Alpha stage so please bear with the bugs for now.

Our online multiplayer 3D social gaming portal is ready with its Web and iOS versions of these 3D card games: Poker, Rummy and Flush (Teen Patti). Beside this, the development of other 3D card games - Blackjack, Baccarat and Casino Wars is underway.

As much as all of the above games may sound familiar to you but what we have tried to develop is a complete re-invention of what already exists.

Our game offers you the luxury of playing a game of cards with your friend who sits half way across the world and you can still relish the fun & excitement of an enthralling card game, like you are playing on a table together! You can now express yourself in an online card game by a mere click. Or how about a victory dance through your avatar after beating a higher ranking player!

Presenting to you, ladies and gentlemen and all the crazy card game lovers out there - GAMENTIO

Gamentio - an online multiplayer 3D casino gaming portal - has the capacity to be the next big thing in the world of gaming. And here is why we say so:


A great deal of features:

3D Card Games: Unlike the numerous online games floating in the market, we are offering Social card games in 3D. We are ready with the Web version of Poker, Rummy and Flush. Given the huge contrast of look and feel between a 2D game and Gamentio, we are sure that players will love the refreshing change that Gamentio has to offer.

The normal sucky 2D interface v/s The All-powerful 3D-experience of Gamentio

Real Life Experience: The USP of Gamentio is that the Avatars have the capability of imitating the player’s actions. On the command of the players, Avatars can wave a Hi to their opponents, or convey their joy by raising the hands, punching the air, they can also do a little victory dance routine at a win! Gamentio is the only online Card game that allows its players the chance to express themselves just like they would do in a real life card game.


3D Avatars: To take the gaming experience up a notch, we have designed 3D models who can be customized to become a player’s Avatar. So, whether a player decides to play as a rowdy cowboy or as a sharp businessman, we have all the options. A player can choose from our 10 male and 10 female 3D models and customize to be whatever they want to be.  


Socialize: A range of interactive options are provided by us. Players can revel in the fun and indulge in features like private messaging, blogs, invites, real time activity feed, comment & like favorite posts and do much more! With players growing in numbers, very soon Gamentio will have it’s very own gaming community.


3D Room and Private Gaming: The 3D room, where the game is set, enables the players to toy with the camera angles, choose seats, etc. Players can even create a private room and go on a gaming marathon with their friends.


Ranking & Leaderboard: With our easy to follow Leaderboard, players can check out their current rankings and keep an eagle eye on the current leader and rank.


Pure Entertainment: The sole purpose of Gamentio is to provide hours and hours of entertainment to its players. No gambling quotient involved - just easy, hassle free, electrifying fun and entertainment.

Easy Payment Options: Never run out of chips with our easy mobile and SMS payment options. Players can also make in-game payments to unlock the exquisite wardrobe of the Avatars and activate the voice-commands-integrated version of the game.

No Registration Fees: What’s more, Gamentio is absolutely hassle free!! Players can visit the website to play the Web version of the game, register themselves and start playing! No installation, no registration fees whatsoever! A simple login will take the players into the  world of 3D card gaming paradise!



So why the campaign, you ask?

Gamentio is the proud dream and ambitious product of Logic Simplified, that is us. We are a team of 20 gaming enthusiasts, designers and developers from Dehradun, a beautiful tier-2 city of India. We have delivered over 10 games to clients from across the globe, and are now all set to enter the gaming world with our very own online gaming platform - Gamentio.




It all began 3 years ago with a team of three members , lead by Sumeet Arora, the founder of Logic Simplified Pvt. Ltd. Sumeet who has also published a book, WebGL Game Development (Get your copy HERE). He visualized the entire future of Gamentio. From the initial stages of the project, Sumeet knew exactly what he wanted, where he wanted it, and how he wanted it to be.  To connect and know about Sumeet feel free to visit his profile on LinkedIN

We had few resources, but the dream to build something of our own kept us going through. Team started growing with professionals who are head over heels in love with card games (even hired an expert with 10,000 hours spread over 11 years of online card game-play experience!), and with designers and developers who deeply believe in our idea, Gamentio started taking shape. Since then, we have come a long way, and are now climbing the final few steps towards a grand launch.

What’s MORE to do?



Although the Web & iOS versions of the game are ready, we still have a list of things that are to be done to ensure that the game is as awesome as we want it to be. So, here is what we are planning to do:

1. MORE availability: After the web & iOS versions, our plan is to focus on the Android version of Gamentio. Since the world is already past the mobile Tipping Point according to this report (from comScore), we want to accelerate the development of Android version of the game so that we can reach a wider user base sooner than later while making Gamentio more accessible and on-the-go.

2. MORE features: A range of 3D rooms with different ambiances and moods, a wide collection of clothes, more vivid avatars, variety of expressions and gestures, etc. We want to integrate all these features to make Gamentio launch ready.

3. MORE games: Gamentio is a platform where we will be adding more and more games in the coming times. Blackjack, Baccarat, Casino Wars, Slots and Roulette are some of the top of the list names that we want to add. We have successfully architected Gamentio in such a way that we can now launch any card game in less than a month’s time. Every popular casino card game will find its way into Gamentio eventually.


4. MORE stunning: Among other things, integrated-voice-command facility is one feature that we are currently working on. Once done, the game will be monitored and controlled by over 500 voice commands.


5. MORE Aggression: Show your mettle! We understand the need of a competitive edge that drives a card game. Our regular tournaments will give the players the opportunity to compete with other players across the world, score points, win attractive prizes and climb up the leaderboard. We will make it as interactive and exciting as a real casino.

6. MORE real than ever: Learn from the Pros. We also intend to invite the top professional Poker players to play in our featured main event tournaments. Watch them play, cheer your favorites, learn from their tactics. Make the most of it.

7. MORE rigorous testing: To ascertain that you have an extremely delightful experience with us, our team of developers and testers will be leaving no stone unturned during the testing and trials. Our goal is to deliver a smooth, flawless, memorable online gaming experience to the players.

Why we need your support?

To achieve all the goals listed above, we need resources and funds. After three years of efforts and utilizing whatever resources we had, we have run out of funds to carry our dream any further. As of now, we were working on the project on a part-time basis; majorly working on weekends and holidays. Once we get a considerable amount of funding, we will be able to allocate dedicated resources to Project Gamentio, and deliver higher standards of quality and quantity within the decided time frame.

That is why we need the support from you guys. Given below is how we are planning to proceed  and how your help can make a difference for us.

Where will the funding be utilized?

Our team will comprise of Four Designers, Four Developers (One back-end and three front-end), Three Testers (who will also be taking care of the marketing) and One Project Manager to lead the team and ensure that goals are met within the decided timeline. Additional to that will be the testing devices, server cost, salaries, etc. Taking all the expenses and costs into consideration, we are looking for USD 100,000 crowd sourced funding to enable us to turn our efforts into a reality.



With your backing & support, if we surpass our goal of $100,000, we will be utilizing that funding in the development of new social games as mentioned in Point 3 above. So, the number of games we make & add to Gamentio will be dependent on the contribution we get over and above our targeted goal.

We firmly believe that your support will help us to keep our work running and reach our goals very soon.

With our passion and your support, we are confident that we will be able to acquire 10% of the total market share of Social games by 2019.

Needless to say, we will keep you posted on all our updates and achievements over the coming few months. You will know exactly where your funds are been utilized, and how your support is helping us achieve our goals.

Rewards

Pick your perk for your favorite goodies!

$1 - Hello There!!

Contributors receive a special ‘Thank You’ note from Team Gamentio. Welcome to Gamentio, guys!

$5 - Ducks

Show your support and become a member of Gamentio! Play with 15,000 Gamentio Coins.

$15 - Meat Hooks

Get a quirky Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 60,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$30 - Maverick

Yay! You just became a Backer!

Get a set of Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 90,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$50 - Ajax

You got some options here. Pick one!

   

  • Wristband + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 2,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • Cap + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 2,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • 3D Chips + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 2,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$85 - Hooks

Here comes a biggie! Options again, pick one!

  • Cap + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 3,75,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • 3D Chips + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 3,75,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$100 - Divas

Awesome options again. Pick away!

 

  • Sipper + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 5,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • 3D Playing Cards + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership +  5,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • T Shirt + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 5,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$125 - Cowboys

Choose one of the two nice blend of rewards!

 

  • Stylish T-Shirt + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 7,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • Sipper + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership +  7,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$160 - Big Slick

Make your choice from these two amazing packs of rewards.

  • T-Shirt + Cap + Wristband + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 10,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • 3D Playing Cards + Cap + Wristband + Mug + Playing Cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 10,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$200 - Bullets

Along with the other rewards, you get an amazing opportunity to work with our designers and customize a 3D Avatar that exhibits your personality the best.

  • 1 3D Avatar + Hall of Fame + T-Shirt + 3D Playing Cards + Cap + Wristband + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 14,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$350 - Pocket Rockets

Give it up for the Super reward pack! Pick your favorite!!

  • 5 3D Avatar + T-Shirt + Mug + Playing cards + Hall of Fame + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 27,50,000 Gamentio Coins.**

  • Poker Table Cover + T-Shirt + Cap + Mug + Playing Cards + Hall of Fame + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership + 27,50,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$1,000 - The Rock

In addition to wonderful awards we offer a golden opportunity to put your promotional ads on Gamentio Card Rooms for 10 days.

  • 10 Days Advertisement in all the rooms/10K Unique Impressions + Poker Table Cover + Hall of Fame + T-Shirt + 3D Playing Cards + Sipper + 3D Chips + Cap + Wristband + Mug + Playing cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership +  35,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

$2,000 -  The Shark  

Extend your advertisement period to 30 days along with other nice pack of rewards!

  • 30 Days Advertisement in all the rooms/25K Unique Impressions + Poker Table Cover + Hall of Fame + T-Shirt + 3D Playing Cards + Sipper + 3D Chips + Cap + Wristband + Mug + Playing cards + Fridge Magnet + Gamentio Membership +  50,00,000 Gamentio Coins.**

**Non-Indian backers please add $15 USD for shipping.

Our request

Thanks for taking out the time and becoming a part of our story. Do contribute in whichever way possible, as without your help our endless efforts will go down the drain. We are sure you certainly won’t let that happen. We believe in each one of you, so whether you are contributing, or sharing our story to other passionate players, please know that each gesture means a lot for our dream.

So, here we go... Let's make this happen!!! Contribute, share, support.

Go Game, #GoGamentio!


Referral Contest

Ready to get some amazing rewards? We are running a referral contest which means you can take some gifts by simply referring your friends to contribute to our campaign! After all, what are friends for? To win awesome Amazon Gift Cards!!

Just follow these four simple steps:

  1. Log in to your Indiegogo Account (Logging in is important else you'll not get your unique referral code)
  2. Go to our Indiegogo Campaign Page here
  3. See the buttons on the left hand side of the main video? Click on the Link button; it's the Second Last button. (Didn’t we say it was easy?!). Just copy the unique URL you will get by clicking the "Link" button.
  4. Share away this unique link in your mails, social networks, chats etc with as many people as possible. More sharing = Better chances to win!
The Top 3 Stars who raise the most contribution out of referrals will receive cool Amazon.com Gift Cards!
  • Winner: $75 Gift Card
  • Runner Up 1: $50 Gift Card
  • Runner Up 2: $25 Gift Card
So, Hurry up, others are already referring..!!

Note: You can keep a track of your referrals and their contributions through your Indiegogo Profile.

#GoGamentio

Thanks,

Team Gamentio

You can now express yourself in an online card game by a mere click. Or how about a victory dance through your avatar after beating a higher ranking player!Presenting to you, ladies and gentlemen and all the crazy card game lovers out there - GAMENTIO





Gamentio - an online multiplayer 3D casino gaming portal - has the capacity to be the next big thing in the world of gaming. And here is why we say so:
A great deal of features:
3D Card Games: Unlike the numerous online games floating in the market, we are offering Social card games in 3D. We are ready with the Web version of Poker, Rummy and Flush. Given the huge contrast of look and feel between a 2D game and Gamentio, we are sure that players will love the refreshing change that Gamentio has to offer.

The normal sucky 2D interface v/s The All-powerful 3D-experience of Gamentio
Real Life Experience: The USP of Gamentio is that the Avatars have the capability of imitating the player’s actions. On the command of the players, Avatars can wave a Hi to their opponents, or convey their joy by raising the hands, punching the air, they can also do a little victory dance routine at a win! Gamentio is the only online Card game that allows its players the chance to express themselves just like they would do in a real life card game.



3D Avatars: To take the gaming experience up a notch, we have designed 3D models who can be customized to become a player’s Avatar. So, whether a player decides to play as a rowdy cowboy or as a sharp businessman, we have all the options. A player can choose from our 10 male and 10 female 3D models and customize to be whatever they want to be.  


Socialize: A range of interactive options are provided by us. Players can revel in the fun and indulge in features like private messaging, blogs, invites, real time activity feed, comment & like favorite posts and do much more! With players growing in numbers, very soon Gamentio will have it’s very own gaming community.


3D Room and Private Gaming: The 3D room, where the game is set, enables the players to toy with the camera angles, choose seats, etc. Players can even create a private room and go on a gaming marathon with their friends.




Ranking & Leaderboard: With our easy to follow Leaderboard, players can check out their current rankings and keep an eagle eye on the current leader and rank.


Pure Entertainment: The sole purpose of Gamentio is to provide hours and hours of entertainment to its players. No gambling quotient involved - just easy, hassle free, electrifying fun and entertainment.
Easy Payment Options: Never run out of chips with our easy mobile and SMS payment options. Players can also make in-game payments to unlock the exquisite wardrobe of the Avatars and activate the voice-commands-integrated version of the game.
No Registration Fees: What’s more, Gamentio is absolutely hassle free!! Players can visit the website to play the Web version of the game, register themselves and start playing! No installation, no registration fees whatsoever! A simple login will take the players into the  world of 3D card gaming paradise!


So why the campaign, you ask?
Gamentio is the proud dream and ambitious product of Logic Simplified, that is us. We are a team of 20 gaming enthusiasts, designers and developers from Dehradun, a beautiful tier-2 city of India. We have delivered over 10 games to clients from across the globe, and are now all set to enter the gaming world with our very own online gaming platform - Gamentio.





It all began 3 years ago with a team of three members , lead by Sumeet Arora, the founder of Logic Simplified Pvt. Ltd. Sumeet who has also published a book, WebGL Game Development (Get your copy HERE). He visualized the entire future of Gamentio. From the initial stages of the project, Sumeet knew exactly what he wanted, where he wanted it, and how he wanted it to be.  To connect and know about Sumeet feel free to visit his profile on LinkedIN
We had few resources, but the dream to build something of our own kept us going through. Team started growing with professionals who are head over heels in love with card games (even hired an expert with 10,000 hours spread over 11 years of online card game-play experience!), and with designers and developers who deeply believe in our idea, Gamentio started taking shape. Since then, we have come a long way, and are now climbing the final few steps towards a grand launch. 
What’s MORE to do?

Although the Web & iOS versions of the game are ready, we still have a list of things that are to be done to ensure that the game is as awesome as we want it to be. So, here is what we are planning to do: 
1. MORE availability: After the web & iOS versions, our plan is to focus on the Android version of Gamentio. Since the world is already past the mobile Tipping Point according to this report (from comScore), we want to accelerate the development of Android version of the game so that we can reach a wider user base sooner than later while making Gamentio more accessible and on-the-go. 
2. MORE features: A range of 3D rooms with different ambiances and moods, a wide collection of clothes, more vivid avatars, variety of expressions and gestures, etc. We want to integrate all these features to make Gamentio launch ready.


3. MORE games: Gamentio is a platform where we will be adding more and more games in the coming times. Blackjack, Baccarat, Casino Wars, Slots and Roulette are some of the top of the list names that we want to add. We have successfully architected Gamentio in such a way that we can now launch any card game in less than a month’s time. Every popular casino card game will find its way into Gamentio eventually. 

4. MORE stunning: Among other things, integrated-voice-command facility is one feature that we are currently working on. Once done, the game will be monitored and controlled by over 500 voice commands.

5. MORE Aggression: Show your mettle! We understand the need of a competitive edge that drives a card game. Our regular tournaments will give the players the opportunity to compete with other players across the world, score points, win attractive prizes and climb up the leaderboard. We will make it as interactive and exciting as a real casino.
6. MORE real than ever: Learn from the Pros. We also intend to invite the top professional Poker players to play in our featured main event tournaments. Watch them play, cheer your favorites, learn from their tactics. Make the most of it.
7. MORE rigorous testing: To ascertain that you have an extremely delightful experience with us, our team of developers and testers will be leaving no stone unturned during the testing and trials. Our goal is to deliver a smooth, flawless, memorable online gaming experience to the players.

Why we need your support?
To achieve all the goals listed above, we need resources and funds. After three years of efforts and utilizing whatever resources we had, we have run out of funds to carry our dream any further. As of now, we were working on the project on a part-time basis; majorly working on weekends and holidays. Once we get a considerable amount of funding, we will be able to allocate dedicated resources to Project Gamentio, and deliver higher standards of quality and quantity within the decided time frame.
That is why we need the support from you guys. Given below is how we are planning to proceed  and how your help can make a difference for us.
Where will the funding be utilized?
Our team will comprise of Four Designers, Four Developers (One back-end and three front-end), Three Testers (who will also be taking care of the marketing) and One Project Manager to lead the team and ensure that goals are met within the decided timeline. Additional to that will be the testing devices, server cost, salaries, etc. Taking all the expenses and costs into consideration, we are looking for USD 100,000 crowd sourced funding to enable us to turn our efforts into a reality.

With your backing & support, if we surpass our goal of $100,000, we will be utilizing that funding in the development of new social games as mentioned in Point 3 above. So, the number of games we make & add to Gamentio will be dependent on the contribution we get over and above our targeted goal.We firmly believe that your support will help us to keep our work running and reach our goals very soon. 
With our passion and your support, we are confident that we will be able to acquire 10% of the total market share of Social games by 2019. 
Needless to say, we will keep you posted on all our updates and achievements over the coming few months. You will know exactly where your funds are been utilized, and how your support is helping us achieve our goals.
Rewards
Pick your perk for your favorite goodies!
$1 - Hello There!!

Contributors receive a special ‘Thank You’ note from Team Gamentio. Welcome to Gamentio, guys!

Show your support and become a member of Gamentio! Play with 15,000 Gamentio Coins.

**Non-Indian backers please add $15 USD for shipping.
Our request
Thanks for taking out the time and becoming a part of our story. Do contribute in whichever way possible, as without your help our endless efforts will go down the drain. We are sure you certainly won’t let that happen. We believe in each one of you, so whether you are contributing, or sharing our story to other passionate players, please know that each gesture means a lot for our dream.
So, here we go... Let's make this happen!!! Contribute, share, support.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
